veṇumurajakāṃsyatāladardurapuṭaprabhṛtiṣu vādyeṣu bharatādipraṇīteṣu nṛttaśā-<75,16>
streṣu nāradīyaprabhṛtiṣu gāndharvavedaviśeṣeṣu hastiśikṣāyāṃ turagavayo-<75,17>
jñāne puruṣalakṣaṇeṣu citrakarmaṇi pattracchedye pustakavyāpāre lekhyakarmaṇi <75,18>
sarvāsu dyūtakalāsu gandharvaśāstreṣu śakunirutajñāne grahagaṇite ratnaparī-<75,19>
kṣāsu dārukarmaṇi dantavyāpāre vāstuvidyāsvāyurvede yantraprayoge viṣā-<75,20>
paharaṇe suruṅgopabhede taraṇe laṅghane plutiṣvārohaṇe ratitantreṣvindrajāle <75,21>
kathāsu nāṭakeṣvākhyāyikāsu kāvyeṣu mahābhāratapurāṇetihāsarāmāya-<75,22>
ṇeṣu sarvalipiṣu sarvadeśabhāṣāsu sarvasaṃjñāsu sarvaśilpeṣu chandaḥsvanye-<75,23>
ṣvapi kalāviśeṣeṣu paraṃ kauśalamavāpa | <76,1>

candrāpīḍopyananyahṛdayatayā tathā niyantrito rājñācireṇaiva kālena yathāsvamātmakauśalaṃ prakaṭayadbhiḥ pātravaśādupajātotsāhairācāryairupadiśyamānāḥ sarvā vidyā jagrāha | maṇidarpaṇa ivātinirmale tasminsaṃcakrāma sakalaḥ kalākalāpaḥ | tathā hi pade vākye pramāṇe dharmaśāstre rājanītiṣu vyāyāmavidyāsu cāpacakracarmakṛpāṇaśaktitomaraparaśugadāprabhṛtiṣu sarveṣvāyudhaviśeṣeṣu rathacaryāsu gajapṛṣṭheṣu turaṃgameṣu vīṇāveṇumurajakāṃsyatāladardurapuṭaprabhṛtiṣu vādyeṣu bharatādipraṇīteṣu nṛttaśāstreṣu nāradīyaprabhṛtiṣu gāndharvavedaviśeṣeṣu hastiśikṣāyāṃ turagavayojñāne puruṣalakṣaṇeṣu citrakarmaṇi pattracchedye pustakavyāpāre lekhyakarmaṇi sarvāsu dyūtakalāsu gandharvaśāstreṣu śakunirutajñāne grahagaṇite ratnaparīkṣāsu dārukarmaṇi dantavyāpāre vāstuvidyāsvāyurvede yantraprayoge viṣāpaharaṇe suruṅgopabhede taraṇe laṅghane plutiṣvārohaṇe ratitantreṣvindrajāle kathāsu nāṭakeṣvākhyāyikāsu kāvyeṣu mahābhāratapurāṇetihāsarāmāyaṇeṣu sarvalipiṣu sarvadeśabhāṣāsu sarvasaṃjñāsu sarvaśilpeṣu chandaḥsvanyeṣvapi kalāviśeṣeṣu paraṃ kauśalamavāpa |

76,1

sahajā cāsyājasramabhyasyato vṛkodarasyeva śaiśava evāvirba-<76,2>
bhūva sarvalokavismayajananī mahāprāṇatā | yadṛcchayā krīḍatāpyanena <76,3>
karatalāvalambitakarṇapallavāvanatāṅgāḥ siṃhakiśorakakramākrāntā iva <76,4>
gajakalabhakāścalitumapi na śekuḥ | ekaikena kṛpāṇaprahāreṇa bāla <76,5>
eva tālatarūnmṛṇāladaṇḍāniva lulāva | sakalarājanyavaṃśavanadā-<76,6>
vānalasya paraśurāmasyevāsya nārācāḥ śikhariśilātalabhido <76,7>
babhūvuḥ | daśapuruṣasaṃvāhanayogyena cāyodaṇḍena śramamakarot | ṛte <76,8>
ca mahāprāṇatāyāḥ sarvābhiranyābhiḥ kalābhiranucakāra taṃ vaiśampā-<76,9>
yanaḥ | candrāpīḍasya tu sakalakalākalāpaparicayabahumānena śukanā-<76,10>
sagauraveṇa sahapāṃśukrīḍanatayā sahasaṃvṛddhatayā ca sarvaviśrambhasthānaṃ <76,11>
dvitīyamiva hṛdayaṃ vaiśampāyanaḥ paraṃ mitramāsīt | nimeṣamapi tena <76,12>
vinā sthātumekākī na śaśāka | vaiśampāyanopi tamuṣṇakaramiva <76,13>
vāsaronugacchanna kṣaṇamapi virahayāṃcakāra | <76,14>

sahajā cāsyājasramabhyasyato vṛkodarasyeva śaiśava evāvirbabhūva sarvalokavismayajananī mahāprāṇatā | yadṛcchayā krīḍatāpyanena karatalāvalambitakarṇapallavāvanatāṅgāḥ siṃhakiśorakakramākrāntā iva gajakalabhakāścalitumapi na śekuḥ | ekaikena kṛpāṇaprahāreṇa bāla eva tālatarūnmṛṇāladaṇḍāniva lulāva | sakalarājanyavaṃśavanadāvānalasya paraśurāmasyevāsya nārācāḥ śikhariśilātalabhido babhūvuḥ | daśapuruṣasaṃvāhanayogyena cāyodaṇḍena śramamakarot | ṛte ca mahāprāṇatāyāḥ sarvābhiranyābhiḥ kalābhiranucakāra taṃ vaiśampāyanaḥ | candrāpīḍasya tu sakalakalākalāpaparicayabahumānena śukanāsagauraveṇa sahapāṃśukrīḍanatayā sahasaṃvṛddhatayā ca sarvaviśrambhasthānaṃ dvitīyamiva hṛdayaṃ vaiśampāyanaḥ paraṃ mitramāsīt | nimeṣamapi tena vinā sthātumekākī na śaśāka | vaiśampāyanopi tamuṣṇakaramiva vāsaronugacchanna kṣaṇamapi virahayāṃcakāra |

76,14

evaṃ tasya sarvavidyāparicayamācarataścandrāpīḍasya tribhuvanavilobha-<76,15>
nīyomṛtarasa iva sāgarasya sakalalokahṛdayānandajananaścandrodaya iva <76,16>
pradoṣasya bahuvidharāgavikārabhaṅguraḥ suradhanuḥkalāpa iva jaladharasa-<76,17>
mayasya makaradhvajāyudhabhūtaḥ kusumaprasava iva kalpapādapasyābhinavābhi-<76,18>
vyajyamānarāgaramaṇīyaḥ sūryodaya iva kamalavanasya vividhalāsyavi-<76,19>
lāsayogyaḥ kalāpa iva śikhaṇḍino yauvanārambhaḥ prādurbhavantramaṇīya-<76,20>
syāpi dviguṇāṃ ramaṇīyatāṃ pupoṣa | labdhāvasaro navasevaka iva ni-<76,21>
kaṭībabhūvāsya manmathaḥ | lakṣmyā saha vitastāra vakṣaḥsthalam | bandhuja-<76,22>
namanorathaiḥ sahāpūryatorudaṇḍadvayam | arijanena saha tanimānamabhajata <76,23>
madhyabhāgaḥ | tyāgena saha prathimānamātatāna nitambabhāgaḥ | pratāpena <77,1>
sahāruroha romarājiḥ | ahitakalatrālakalatābhiḥ saha pralambatāmu-<77,2>
payayau bhujayugalam | caritena saha dhavalatāmabhajata locanayugalam | <77,3>
ājñayā saha gururbabhūva bhujaśikharadeśaḥ | svareṇa saha gambhīratāmā-<77,4>
jagāma hṛdayam | <77,5>

evaṃ tasya sarvavidyāparicayamācarataścandrāpīḍasya tribhuvanavilobhanīyomṛtarasa iva sāgarasya sakalalokahṛdayānandajananaścandrodaya iva pradoṣasya bahuvidharāgavikārabhaṅguraḥ suradhanuḥkalāpa iva jaladharasamayasya makaradhvajāyudhabhūtaḥ kusumaprasava iva kalpapādapasyābhinavābhivyajyamānarāgaramaṇīyaḥ sūryodaya iva kamalavanasya vividhalāsyavilāsayogyaḥ kalāpa iva śikhaṇḍino yauvanārambhaḥ prādurbhavantramaṇīyasyāpi dviguṇāṃ ramaṇīyatāṃ pupoṣa | labdhāvasaro navasevaka iva nikaṭībabhūvāsya manmathaḥ | lakṣmyā saha vitastāra vakṣaḥsthalam | bandhujanamanorathaiḥ sahāpūryatorudaṇḍadvayam | arijanena saha tanimānamabhajata madhyabhāgaḥ | tyāgena saha prathimānamātatāna nitambabhāgaḥ | pratāpena sahāruroha romarājiḥ | ahitakalatrālakalatābhiḥ saha pralambatāmupayayau bhujayugalam | caritena saha dhavalatāmabhajata locanayugalam | ājñayā saha gururbabhūva bhujaśikharadeśaḥ | svareṇa saha gambhīratāmājagāma hṛdayam |

77,5

evaṃ ca krameṇa samārūḍhayauvanārambhaṃ parisamāptasakalakalāvijñāna-<77,6>
madhītāśeṣavidyaṃ cāvagamyānumoditamācāryaiścandrāpīḍamānetuṃ rājā balā-<77,7>
dhikṛtaṃ balāhakanāmānamāhūya bahuturagabalapadātiparivṛtamatipraśastehani <77,8>
prāhiṇot | sa gatvā vidyāgṛhaṃ dvāḥsthaiḥ samāveditaḥ praviśya kṣiti-<77,9>
talāvilambitacūḍāmaṇinā śirasā praṇamya svabhūmisamucite rājasa-<77,10>
mīpa iva savinayamāsane rājaputrānumato nyaṣīdat | sthitvā ca muhū-<77,11>
rtamātraṃ balāhakaścandrāpīḍamupasṛtya darśitavinayo vyajijñapat | ku-<77,12>
māra mahārājaḥ samājñāpayati | pūrṇā no manorathāḥ | adhītāni <77,13>
śāstrāṇi | śikṣitāḥ sakalāḥ kalāḥ | gatosi sarvāsvāyudhavidyāsu <77,14>
parāṃ pratiṣṭhām | anumatosi nirgamāya vidyāgṛhātsarvācāryaiḥ | <77,15>
upagṛhītaśikṣaṃ gandhagajakumārakamiva vāribandhādvinirgatamavagatasaka-<77,16>
lakalākalāpaṃ paurṇamāsīśaśinamiva navodgataṃ paśyatu tvāṃ janaḥ | vra-<77,17>
jantu saphalatāmaticiradarśanotkaṇṭhitāni lokalocanāni | darśanaṃ prati <77,18>
te samutsukānyatīva sarvāṇyantaḥpurāṇi | ayamatrabhavato daśamo va-<77,19>
tsaro vidyāgṛhamadhivasataḥ | praviṣṭosi ṣaṣṭhamanubhavanvarṣam | evaṃ saṃ-<77,20>
piṇḍitenāmunā ṣoḍaśena pravardhase | tadadyaprabhṛti nirgatya darśanotsukā-<77,21>
bhyo dattvā darśanamakhilābhyo mātṛbhyobhivādya ca gurūnapagataniyantraṇo <77,22>
yathāsukhamanubhava rājyasukhāni navayauvanalalitāni ca | saṃmānaya rāja-<77,23>
lokam | pūjaya dvijātīn | paripālaya prajāḥ | ānandaya bandhuvargam | <78,1>
ayaṃ ca te tribhuvanaikaratnamanilagaruḍasamajava indrāyudhanāmā turaṃgamaḥ <78,2>
preṣito mahārājena dvāri tiṣṭhati | eṣa khalu devasya pārasīkādhipatinā <78,3>
tribhuvanāścaryamiti kṛtvā jaladhijalādutthitamayonijamidamaśvaratnamā-<78,4>
sāditaṃ mayā mahārājādhirohaṇayogyamiti saṃdiśya prahitaḥ | dṛṣṭvā <78,5>
ca niveditaṃ lakṣaṇavidbhiḥ | deva yānyuccaiḥśravasaḥ śrūyante lakṣaṇāni <78,6>
tairayamupeto naivaṃvidho bhūto bhāvī vā turaṃgama iti | tadayamanugṛhyatā-<78,7>
madhirohaṇena | idaṃ ca mūrdhābhiṣiktapārthivakulaprasūtānāṃ vinayopapa-<78,8>
nnānāṃ śūrāṇāmabhirūpāṇāṃ kalāvatāṃ ca kulakramāgatānāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ <78,9>
sahasraṃ paricārārthamanupreṣitaṃ turaṃgamādhirūḍhaṃ dvāri praṇāmalālasaṃ prati-<78,10>
pālayati | <78,11>

evaṃ ca krameṇa samārūḍhayauvanārambhaṃ parisamāptasakalakalāvijñānamadhītāśeṣavidyaṃ cāvagamyānumoditamācāryaiścandrāpīḍamānetuṃ rājā balādhikṛtaṃ balāhakanāmānamāhūya bahuturagabalapadātiparivṛtamatipraśastehani prāhiṇot | sa gatvā vidyāgṛhaṃ dvāḥsthaiḥ samāveditaḥ praviśya kṣititalāvilambitacūḍāmaṇinā śirasā praṇamya svabhūmisamucite rājasamīpa iva savinayamāsane rājaputrānumato nyaṣīdat | sthitvā ca muhūrtamātraṃ balāhakaścandrāpīḍamupasṛtya darśitavinayo vyajijñapat | kumāra mahārājaḥ samājñāpayati | pūrṇā no manorathāḥ | adhītāni śāstrāṇi | śikṣitāḥ sakalāḥ kalāḥ | gatosi sarvāsvāyudhavidyāsu parāṃ pratiṣṭhām | anumatosi nirgamāya vidyāgṛhātsarvācāryaiḥ | upagṛhītaśikṣaṃ gandhagajakumārakamiva vāribandhādvinirgatamavagatasakalakalākalāpaṃ paurṇamāsīśaśinamiva navodgataṃ paśyatu tvāṃ janaḥ | vrajantu saphalatāmaticiradarśanotkaṇṭhitāni lokalocanāni | darśanaṃ prati te samutsukānyatīva sarvāṇyantaḥpurāṇi | ayamatrabhavato daśamo vatsaro vidyāgṛhamadhivasataḥ | praviṣṭosi ṣaṣṭhamanubhavanvarṣam | evaṃ saṃpiṇḍitenāmunā ṣoḍaśena pravardhase | tadadyaprabhṛti nirgatya darśanotsukābhyo dattvā darśanamakhilābhyo mātṛbhyobhivādya ca gurūnapagataniyantraṇo yathāsukhamanubhava rājyasukhāni navayauvanalalitāni ca | saṃmānaya rājalokam | pūjaya dvijātīn | paripālaya prajāḥ | ānandaya bandhuvargam | ayaṃ ca te tribhuvanaikaratnamanilagaruḍasamajava indrāyudhanāmā turaṃgamaḥ preṣito mahārājena dvāri tiṣṭhati | eṣa khalu devasya pārasīkādhipatinā tribhuvanāścaryamiti kṛtvā jaladhijalādutthitamayonijamidamaśvaratnamāsāditaṃ mayā mahārājādhirohaṇayogyamiti saṃdiśya prahitaḥ | dṛṣṭvā ca niveditaṃ lakṣaṇavidbhiḥ | deva yānyuccaiḥśravasaḥ śrūyante lakṣaṇāni tairayamupeto naivaṃvidho bhūto bhāvī vā turaṃgama iti | tadayamanugṛhyatāmadhirohaṇena | idaṃ ca mūrdhābhiṣiktapārthivakulaprasūtānāṃ vinayopapannānāṃ śūrāṇāmabhirūpāṇāṃ kalāvatāṃ ca kulakramāgatānāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ paricārārthamanupreṣitaṃ turaṃgamādhirūḍhaṃ dvāri praṇāmalālasaṃ pratipālayati |

78,11

ityabhidhāya viratavacasi balāhake candrāpīḍaḥ piturājñāṃ śirasi <78,12>
kṛtvā navajaladharadhvānagambhīrayā girā praveśyatāmindrāyudha iti ni-<78,13>
rjigamiṣurādideśa | <78,14>

ityabhidhāya viratavacasi balāhake candrāpīḍaḥ piturājñāṃ śirasi kṛtvā navajaladharadhvānagambhīrayā girā praveśyatāmindrāyudha iti nirjigamiṣurādideśa |

78,14

atha vacanānantarameva praveśitamubhayataḥ khalīnakanakakaṭakāvala-<78,15>
gnābhyāṃ pade pade kṛtākuñcanaprayatnābhyāṃ puruṣābhyāmavakṛṣyamāṇamatipra-<78,16>
māṇamūrdhvakarapuruṣaprāpyapṛṣṭhabhāgamāpibantamiva saṃmukhāgatamakhilamākā-<78,17>
śamatiniṣṭhureṇa muhurmuhuḥ prakampitodararandhreṇa heṣāraveṇa pūritabhuvano-<78,18>
daravivareṇa nirbhartsayantamivālīkavegadurvidagdhaṃ garutmantamatidūramava-<78,19>
namatā pratikṣaṇamatidūramunnamatā ca javanirodhasphītaroṣaghuraghurāyamāṇa-<78,20>
ghoraghoṇena śirobhāgeṇa nijajavadarpavaśādullaṅghanārthamākalayantamiva tri-<78,21>
bhuvanamasitapītaharitapāṭalābhirākhaṇḍalacāpānukāriṇībhirlekhābhiḥ ka-<78,22>
lmāṣitaśarīramāstīrṇavicitravarṇakambalamiva kuñjarakalabhaṃ kailāsata-<78,23>
ṭāghātadhātudhūlipāṭalamiva haravṛṣabhamasurarudhirapaṅkalekhālohitasaṭamiva <79,1>
pārvatīsiṃhaṃ raṃhaḥsaṃghātamiva mūrtimantamanavarataparisphuratprothapuṭonmukta-<79,2>
sūtkāreṇātijavāpītamanilamiva nāsikāvivareṇodvamantamantaḥskhali-<79,3>
tamukharakhalīnakharaśikharakṣobhajanmano lālājalabhuvaḥ phenapallavānudadhi-<79,4>
nivāsaparipītāmṛtarasagaṇḍūṣānivodgirantamatyāyatamatinirmāsatayā sa-<79,5>
mutkīrṇamiva vadanamudvahantamānanamaṇḍalanihitāruṇamaṇisamudgatairaṃśuka-<79,6>
lāpairupetenāvasaktaraktacāmareṇeva niścalaśikhareṇa karṇayugalena virāja-<79,7>
mānamujjvalakanakaśṛṅkhalāracitaraśmikalāpakalitayā lākṣālohitala-<79,8>
mbalolasaṭāsaṃtānayā jalanidhisaṃcaraṇalagnavidrumapallavayeva śirodhara-<79,9>
yopaśobhitamatikuṭilakanakapattralatāpratānabhaṅgureṇa pade pade raṇitaratna-<79,10>
mālena sthūlamuktāphalaprāyeṇa tārāgaṇeneva saṃdhyārāgamaruṇenāśvālaṃkā-<79,11>
reṇālaṃkṛtamaśvālaṃkāranihitamarakataratnaprabhāśyāmāyamānadehatayā gaga-<79,12>
natalanipatitadivasakararathaturaṃgamaśaṅkāmivopajanayantamatitejasvitayā <79,13>
javanirodharoṣavaśātpratiromakūpamudgatāni sāgaraparicayāllagnāni mu-<79,14>
ktāphalānīva svedalavajālakāni varṣantamindranīlamaṇipādapīṭhānukā-<79,15>
ribhirañjanaśilāghaṭitairivānavaratapatanotpatanajanitaviṣamakharamukhara-<79,16>
vaiḥ pṛthubhiḥ khurapuṭairjarjaritavasuṃdharairmurajavādyamivābhyasyantamutkīrṇa«-» <79,17>
miva jaṅghāsu vistāritamivorasi ślakṣṇīkṛtamiva mukhe prasāritamiva <79,18>
kaṃdharāyāmullikhitamiva pārśvayordviguṇīkṛtamiva jaghanabhāge javaprati-<79,19>
pakṣamiva garutmatastrailokyasaṃcaraṇasahāyamiva mārutasyāṃśāvatāramivo-<79,20>
caiḥśravaso vegasabrahmacāriṇamiva manasaḥ haricaraṇamiva sakalava-<79,21>
suṃdharollaṅghanakṣamaṃ varuṇahaṃsamiva mānasapracāraṃ madhumāsadivasamiva <79,22>
vikasitāśokapāṭalaṃ vratinamiva bhasmasitapuṇḍrakāṅkitamukhaṃ kamala-<79,23>
vanamiva madhupaṅkapiṅgakesaraṃ grīṣmadivasamiva mahāyāmamugratejasaṃ ca <80,1>
bhujaṃgamiva sadāgatyabhimukhamudadhipulinamiva śaṅkhamālikābharaṇaṃ bhī-<80,2>
tamiva stabdhakarṇa vidyādhararājyamiva cakravartinaravāhanocitaṃ sūryo-<80,3>
dayamiva sakalabhuvanārghārhamaśvātiśayamindrāyudhamadrākṣīt | <80,4>

atha vacanānantarameva praveśitamubhayataḥ khalīnakanakakaṭakāvalagnābhyāṃ pade pade kṛtākuñcanaprayatnābhyāṃ puruṣābhyāmavakṛṣyamāṇamatipramāṇamūrdhvakarapuruṣaprāpyapṛṣṭhabhāgamāpibantamiva saṃmukhāgatamakhilamākāśamatiniṣṭhureṇa muhurmuhuḥ prakampitodararandhreṇa heṣāraveṇa pūritabhuvanodaravivareṇa nirbhartsayantamivālīkavegadurvidagdhaṃ garutmantamatidūramavanamatā pratikṣaṇamatidūramunnamatā ca javanirodhasphītaroṣaghuraghurāyamāṇaghoraghoṇena śirobhāgeṇa nijajavadarpavaśādullaṅghanārthamākalayantamiva tribhuvanamasitapītaharitapāṭalābhirākhaṇḍalacāpānukāriṇībhirlekhābhiḥ kalmāṣitaśarīramāstīrṇavicitravarṇakambalamiva kuñjarakalabhaṃ kailāsataṭāghātadhātudhūlipāṭalamiva haravṛṣabhamasurarudhirapaṅkalekhālohitasaṭamiva pārvatīsiṃhaṃ raṃhaḥsaṃghātamiva mūrtimantamanavarataparisphuratprothapuṭonmuktasūtkāreṇātijavāpītamanilamiva nāsikāvivareṇodvamantamantaḥskhalitamukharakhalīnakharaśikharakṣobhajanmano lālājalabhuvaḥ phenapallavānudadhinivāsaparipītāmṛtarasagaṇḍūṣānivodgirantamatyāyatamatinirmāsatayā samutkīrṇamiva vadanamudvahantamānanamaṇḍalanihitāruṇamaṇisamudgatairaṃśukalāpairupetenāvasaktaraktacāmareṇeva niścalaśikhareṇa karṇayugalena virājamānamujjvalakanakaśṛṅkhalāracitaraśmikalāpakalitayā lākṣālohitalambalolasaṭāsaṃtānayā jalanidhisaṃcaraṇalagnavidrumapallavayeva śirodharayopaśobhitamatikuṭilakanakapattralatāpratānabhaṅgureṇa pade pade raṇitaratnamālena sthūlamuktāphalaprāyeṇa tārāgaṇeneva saṃdhyārāgamaruṇenāśvālaṃkāreṇālaṃkṛtamaśvālaṃkāranihitamarakataratnaprabhāśyāmāyamānadehatayā gaganatalanipatitadivasakararathaturaṃgamaśaṅkāmivopajanayantamatitejasvitayā javanirodharoṣavaśātpratiromakūpamudgatāni sāgaraparicayāllagnāni muktāphalānīva svedalavajālakāni varṣantamindranīlamaṇipādapīṭhānukāribhirañjanaśilāghaṭitairivānavaratapatanotpatanajanitaviṣamakharamukharavaiḥ pṛthubhiḥ khurapuṭairjarjaritavasuṃdharairmurajavādyamivābhyasyantamutkīrṇa«-» miva jaṅghāsu vistāritamivorasi ślakṣṇīkṛtamiva mukhe prasāritamiva kaṃdharāyāmullikhitamiva pārśvayordviguṇīkṛtamiva jaghanabhāge javapratipakṣamiva garutmatastrailokyasaṃcaraṇasahāyamiva mārutasyāṃśāvatāramivocaiḥśravaso vegasabrahmacāriṇamiva manasaḥ haricaraṇamiva sakalavasuṃdharollaṅghanakṣamaṃ varuṇahaṃsamiva mānasapracāraṃ madhumāsadivasamiva vikasitāśokapāṭalaṃ vratinamiva bhasmasitapuṇḍrakāṅkitamukhaṃ kamalavanamiva madhupaṅkapiṅgakesaraṃ grīṣmadivasamiva mahāyāmamugratejasaṃ ca bhujaṃgamiva sadāgatyabhimukhamudadhipulinamiva śaṅkhamālikābharaṇaṃ bhītamiva stabdhakarṇa vidyādhararājyamiva cakravartinaravāhanocitaṃ sūryodayamiva sakalabhuvanārghārhamaśvātiśayamindrāyudhamadrākṣīt |

80,4

dṛṣṭvā ca tamadṛṣṭapūrvamamānuṣalokocitākāramakhilatribhuvanarājyo-<80,5>
citamaśeṣalakṣaṇopapannamaśvarūpātiśayamatidhīraprakṛterapi candrāpīḍasya <80,6>
pasparśa vismayo hṛdayam | āsīccāsya manasi | sarabhasavivartanava-<80,7>
litavāsukibhramitamandareṇa mathnatā jalanidhijalamidamaśvaratnamanabhyuddha-<80,8>
ratā kiṃ nāma ratnamuddhṛtaṃ surāsuralokeṇa | anārohatā ca meruśilā-<80,9>
talaviśālamasya pṛṣṭhamākhaṇḍalena kimāsāditaṃ trailokyarājyaphalam | <80,10>
uccaiḥśravasā vismitahṛdayo vañcitaḥ khalu jalanidhinā śatamakhaḥ | <80,11>
manye ca bhagavato nārāyaṇasya cakṣurgocaramiyatā kālena nāyamupa-<80,12>
gataḥ | yenādyāpi tāṃ garuḍārohaṇavyasanitāṃ na parityajati | aho kha-<80,13>
lvatiśayitatridaśarājasamṛddhiriyaṃ tātasya rājyalakṣmīḥ | yadevaṃvidhā-<80,14>
nyapi sakalatribhuvanadurlabhāni ratnānyupakaraṇatāmāgacchanti | atite-<80,15>
jasvitayā mahāprāṇatayā ca sadaivateveyamasyākṛtiḥ | yatsatyamārohaṇe <80,16>
śaṅkāmiva me janayati | na hi sāmānyavājināmamānuṣalokocitāḥ <80,17>
sakalatribhuvanavismayajananya īdṛśyo bhavantyākṛtayaḥ | daivatānyapi <80,18>
hi muniśāpavaśādujjhitanijaśarīrakāṇi śāpavacanopanītāni śa-<80,19>
rīrāntarāṇyadhyāsata eva | śrūyate hi | purā kila sthūlaśirā nāma <80,20>
mahātapā munirakhilabhuvanalalāmabhūtāmapsarasaṃ rambhābhidhānāṃ śaśāpa | <80,21>
sā suralokamapahāyāśvahṛdaye niveśyātmānamaśvahṛdayeti vikhyātā va-<80,22>
ḍavā mṛttikāvatyāṃ śatadhanvānaṃ nāma rājānamupasevamānā martyaloke <80,23>
mahāntaṃ kālamuvāsa | anye ca mahātmāno munijanaśāpaparipīta-<81,1>
prabhāvā nānākārā bhūtvā babhramurimaṃ lokam | asaṃśayamanenāpi ma-<81,2>
hātmanā kenāpi śāpabhājā bhavitavyam | āvedayatīva madantaḥkara-<81,3>
ṇamasya divyatām | <81,4>

dṛṣṭvā ca tamadṛṣṭapūrvamamānuṣalokocitākāramakhilatribhuvanarājyocitamaśeṣalakṣaṇopapannamaśvarūpātiśayamatidhīraprakṛterapi candrāpīḍasya pasparśa vismayo hṛdayam | āsīccāsya manasi | sarabhasavivartanavalitavāsukibhramitamandareṇa mathnatā jalanidhijalamidamaśvaratnamanabhyuddharatā kiṃ nāma ratnamuddhṛtaṃ surāsuralokeṇa | anārohatā ca meruśilātalaviśālamasya pṛṣṭhamākhaṇḍalena kimāsāditaṃ trailokyarājyaphalam | uccaiḥśravasā vismitahṛdayo vañcitaḥ khalu jalanidhinā śatamakhaḥ | manye ca bhagavato nārāyaṇasya cakṣurgocaramiyatā kālena nāyamupagataḥ | yenādyāpi tāṃ garuḍārohaṇavyasanitāṃ na parityajati | aho khalvatiśayitatridaśarājasamṛddhiriyaṃ tātasya rājyalakṣmīḥ | yadevaṃvidhānyapi sakalatribhuvanadurlabhāni ratnānyupakaraṇatāmāgacchanti | atitejasvitayā mahāprāṇatayā ca sadaivateveyamasyākṛtiḥ | yatsatyamārohaṇe śaṅkāmiva me janayati | na hi sāmānyavājināmamānuṣalokocitāḥ sakalatribhuvanavismayajananya īdṛśyo bhavantyākṛtayaḥ | daivatānyapi hi muniśāpavaśādujjhitanijaśarīrakāṇi śāpavacanopanītāni śarīrāntarāṇyadhyāsata eva | śrūyate hi | purā kila sthūlaśirā nāma mahātapā munirakhilabhuvanalalāmabhūtāmapsarasaṃ rambhābhidhānāṃ śaśāpa | sā suralokamapahāyāśvahṛdaye niveśyātmānamaśvahṛdayeti vikhyātā vaḍavā mṛttikāvatyāṃ śatadhanvānaṃ nāma rājānamupasevamānā martyaloke mahāntaṃ kālamuvāsa | anye ca mahātmāno munijanaśāpaparipītaprabhāvā nānākārā bhūtvā babhramurimaṃ lokam | asaṃśayamanenāpi mahātmanā kenāpi śāpabhājā bhavitavyam | āvedayatīva madantaḥkaraṇamasya divyatām |

81,4

iti vicintayannevārurukṣurāsanādudatiṣṭhat | manasā ca taṃ turaṃ-<81,5>
gamamanupasṛtya mahātmannarvanyosi sosi namostu te sarvathā marṣaṇīyo-<81,6>
yamārohaṇātikramosmākamaparigatāni daivatānyapyanucitaparibhavabhāñji <81,7>
bhavantītyāmantrayāṃbabhūva | viditābhiprāya iva sa tamindrāyudhaśca-<81,8>
ṭulaśiraḥkesarasaṭāhatyākūṇitākekaratārakeṇa tiryakcakṣuṣā vilo-<81,9>
kya muhurmuhustāḍayatā kṣititalamutkhātadhūlidhūsaritakroḍaromarājinā <81,10>
dakṣiṇakhureṇārohaṇāyāhvayanniva sphuritaghrāṇavivaraghargharadhvanimiśraṃ ma-<81,11>
dhuramaparuṣahuṃkāraparaṃparānubaddhamatimanoharaṃ heṣāravamakarot | a-<81,12>
thānena madhuraheṣitena dattārohaṇābhyanujña ivendrāyudhamāruroha candrāpī-<81,13>
ḍaḥ | samāruhya taṃ prādeśamātramiva trailokyamakhilaṃ manyamāno nirga-<81,14>
tya pralayajaladharavimuktopalāsāraparuṣeṇa jarjarayateva rasātalamati-<81,15>
niṣṭhureṇa khurapuṭānāṃ raveṇa khurarajoniruddhaghrāṇaghoraghoṣeṇa ca heṣitena <81,16>
badhirīkṛtasakalabhuvanavivaramaśiśirakiraṇadīdhitiparāmarśasphurita-<81,17>
vimalaphalakenordhvīkṛtena kuntalatāvanenonnālanīlotpalakalikāvanaga-<81,18>
hanaṃ sara iva gaganatalamalaṃkurvāṇamuddaṇḍamāyūrātapatrasahasrāndhakāritā-<81,19>
ṣṭadiṅmukhatayā sphuritaśatamanyucāpakalāpakalmāṣamiva jaladharavṛnda-<81,20>
mudvamatphenapuñjadhavalitamukhatayānavaratavalganacaṭulatayā ca pralayasāga-<81,21>
rajalakallolasaṃghātamiva samudgatamadṛṣṭaparyantamaśvasainyamapaśyat | tacca <81,22>
sāgarajalamiva candrodayena candrāpīḍanirgamena sakalameva saṃcacā-<81,23>
lāśvīyam | ahamahamikayā ca praṇāmalālasāḥ sarabhasāpanītātapatra-<82,1>
śūnyaśirasaḥ parasparotpīḍanakupitaturaṃgamanivāraṇāyastā rājaputrāstaṃ <82,2>
paryavārayanta | ekaikaśaśca pratināmagrahaṇamāvedyamānā balāhakena vi-<82,3>
pracalitamukuṭapadmarāgakiraṇodgamacchalenānurāgamivodvamadbhiḥ saṃghaṭitase-<82,4>
vāñjalimukulatayā yauvarājyābhiṣekakalaśāvarjitasalilalagnakamalai-<82,5>
riva dūrāvanataiḥ śirobhiḥ praṇemuḥ | <82,6>

iti vicintayannevārurukṣurāsanādudatiṣṭhat | manasā ca taṃ turaṃgamamanupasṛtya mahātmannarvanyosi sosi namostu te sarvathā marṣaṇīyoyamārohaṇātikramosmākamaparigatāni daivatānyapyanucitaparibhavabhāñji bhavantītyāmantrayāṃbabhūva | viditābhiprāya iva sa tamindrāyudhaścaṭulaśiraḥkesarasaṭāhatyākūṇitākekaratārakeṇa tiryakcakṣuṣā vilokya muhurmuhustāḍayatā kṣititalamutkhātadhūlidhūsaritakroḍaromarājinā dakṣiṇakhureṇārohaṇāyāhvayanniva sphuritaghrāṇavivaraghargharadhvanimiśraṃ madhuramaparuṣahuṃkāraparaṃparānubaddhamatimanoharaṃ heṣāravamakarot | athānena madhuraheṣitena dattārohaṇābhyanujña ivendrāyudhamāruroha candrāpīḍaḥ | samāruhya taṃ prādeśamātramiva trailokyamakhilaṃ manyamāno nirgatya pralayajaladharavimuktopalāsāraparuṣeṇa jarjarayateva rasātalamatiniṣṭhureṇa khurapuṭānāṃ raveṇa khurarajoniruddhaghrāṇaghoraghoṣeṇa ca heṣitena badhirīkṛtasakalabhuvanavivaramaśiśirakiraṇadīdhitiparāmarśasphuritavimalaphalakenordhvīkṛtena kuntalatāvanenonnālanīlotpalakalikāvanagahanaṃ sara iva gaganatalamalaṃkurvāṇamuddaṇḍamāyūrātapatrasahasrāndhakāritāṣṭadiṅmukhatayā sphuritaśatamanyucāpakalāpakalmāṣamiva jaladharavṛndamudvamatphenapuñjadhavalitamukhatayānavaratavalganacaṭulatayā ca pralayasāgarajalakallolasaṃghātamiva samudgatamadṛṣṭaparyantamaśvasainyamapaśyat | tacca sāgarajalamiva candrodayena candrāpīḍanirgamena sakalameva saṃcacālāśvīyam | ahamahamikayā ca praṇāmalālasāḥ sarabhasāpanītātapatraśūnyaśirasaḥ parasparotpīḍanakupitaturaṃgamanivāraṇāyastā rājaputrāstaṃ paryavārayanta | ekaikaśaśca pratināmagrahaṇamāvedyamānā balāhakena vipracalitamukuṭapadmarāgakiraṇodgamacchalenānurāgamivodvamadbhiḥ saṃghaṭitasevāñjalimukulatayā yauvarājyābhiṣekakalaśāvarjitasalilalagnakamalairiva dūrāvanataiḥ śirobhiḥ praṇemuḥ |

82,6

candrāpīḍastu tānsarvānmānayitvā yathocitamanantaraṃ turaṃgamādhi-<82,7>
rūḍhenānugamyamāno vaiśampāyanena rājyalakṣmīnivāsapuṇḍarīkākṛtinā <82,8>
sakalarājanyakulakumudakhaṇḍacandramaṇḍaleneva turaṃgamasenāsravantīpuli-<82,9>
nāyamānena kṣīrodaphenadhavalitavāsukiphaṇāmaṇḍalacchavinā sthūlamuktā-<82,10>
kalāpajālakāvṛtenopari cihnīkṛtaṃ kesariṇamudvahatātimahatā kārtasva-<82,11>
radaṇḍena dhriyamāṇenātapatreṇa nivāritātapa ubhayataḥ samuddhūyamānacā-<82,12>
marakalāpapavananartitakarṇapallavaḥ puraḥpradhāvatā taruṇavīrapuruṣaprāyeṇā-<82,13>
nekasahasrasaṃkhyena padātiparijanena jaya jīveti ca madhuravacasā ma-<82,14>
ṅgalaprāyamanavaratamuccaiḥ paṭhatā bandijanena stūyamāno nagarābhimukhaḥ pra-<82,15>
tasthe | <82,16>

candrāpīḍastu tānsarvānmānayitvā yathocitamanantaraṃ turaṃgamādhirūḍhenānugamyamāno vaiśampāyanena rājyalakṣmīnivāsapuṇḍarīkākṛtinā sakalarājanyakulakumudakhaṇḍacandramaṇḍaleneva turaṃgamasenāsravantīpulināyamānena kṣīrodaphenadhavalitavāsukiphaṇāmaṇḍalacchavinā sthūlamuktākalāpajālakāvṛtenopari cihnīkṛtaṃ kesariṇamudvahatātimahatā kārtasvaradaṇḍena dhriyamāṇenātapatreṇa nivāritātapa ubhayataḥ samuddhūyamānacāmarakalāpapavananartitakarṇapallavaḥ puraḥpradhāvatā taruṇavīrapuruṣaprāyeṇānekasahasrasaṃkhyena padātiparijanena jaya jīveti ca madhuravacasā maṅgalaprāyamanavaratamuccaiḥ paṭhatā bandijanena stūyamāno nagarābhimukhaḥ pratasthe |

82,16

krameṇa ca taṃ samāsāditavigrahamanaṅgamivāvatīrṇaṃ nagaramārgamanuprāpta-<82,17>
mavalokya sarva eva parityaktasakalavyāpāro rajanikarodayaparibudhyamā-<82,18>
nakumudavanānukārī janaḥ samajani | satyasminsaṃprati mukhakumudakada-<82,19>
mbakavikṛtākṛtiḥ kārtikeyo viḍambayati kumāraśabdam | aho vaya-<82,20>
matipuṇyabhājaḥ | yadimāmamānuṣīmasyākṛtimantaḥsamārūḍhaprītirasani-<82,21>
syandavistāritena kutūhalottānitena locanayugalenānivāritāḥ paśyā-<82,22>
maḥ | saphalā nodya jātā janmavattā | sarvathā namosmai rūpāntara-<82,23>
dhāriṇe bhagavate candrāpīḍacchadmane puṇḍarīkekṣaṇāya | iti vadannāracitapra-<83,1>
ṇāmāñjalirnagaralokaḥ praṇanāma | sarvataśca samupāvṛtakapāṭapuṭapraka-<83,2>
ṭavātāyanasahasratayā candrāpīḍadarśanakutūhalānnagaramapi samunmīlita-<83,3>
locananivahamivābhavat | anantaraṃ ca samāptasakalavidyo vidyāgṛhā-<83,4>
nnirgatoyamāgacchati candrāpīḍa iti samākarṇyālokanakutūhalinyaḥ sa-<83,5>
rvasminneva nagare sasaṃbhramamutsṛṣṭārdhaparisamāptaprasādhanavyāpārāḥ kā-<83,6>
ścidvāmakaratalagatadarpaṇāḥ sphuritasakalarajanikaramaṇḍalā iva paurṇa-<83,7>
māsīrajanyaḥ kāścidārdrālaktakarasapāṭalitacaraṇapuṭāḥ kamalapari-<83,8>
pītabālātapā iva nalinyaḥ kāścitsasaṃbhramagativigalitamekhalāka-<83,9>
lāpākulitacaraṇakisalayāḥ śṛṅkhalāsaṃdānamandamandasaṃcāriṇya iva <83,10>
kariṇyaḥ kāścijjaladharasamayadivasaśriya ivendrāyudharāgarucirāmba-<83,11>
radhāriṇyaḥ kāścidullasitadhavalanakhamayūkhapallavānnūpuraravākṛṣṭagṛhaka-<83,12>
lahaṃsakāniva caraṇapuṭānudvahantyaḥ kāścitkaratalasthitasthūlahārayaṣṭayo <83,13>
ratimiva madanavināśaśokagṛhītasphaṭikākṣavalayāṃ viḍambayantyaḥ <83,14>
kāścitpayodharāntarālagalitamuktālatāstanuvimalasrotojalāntaritaca-<83,15>
kravākamithunā iva pradoṣaśriyaḥ kāścinnūpuramaṇisamutthitendrāyudhatayā <83,16>
paricayānugatagṛhamayūrikā iva virājantyaḥ kāścidardhapītojjhita-<83,17>
maṇicaṣakāḥ sphuritarāgairmadhurasamivādharapallavaiḥ kṣarantyo harmyata-<83,18>
lāni lalanāḥ samāruruhuḥ | anyāśca marakatavātāyanavivaravinirga-<83,19>
tamukhamaṇḍalā vikacakamalakośapuṭāmambaratalasaṃcāriṇīṃ kamalinī-<83,20>
miva darśayantyo dadṛśuḥ | <83,21>

krameṇa ca taṃ samāsāditavigrahamanaṅgamivāvatīrṇaṃ nagaramārgamanuprāptamavalokya sarva eva parityaktasakalavyāpāro rajanikarodayaparibudhyamānakumudavanānukārī janaḥ samajani | satyasminsaṃprati mukhakumudakadambakavikṛtākṛtiḥ kārtikeyo viḍambayati kumāraśabdam | aho vayamatipuṇyabhājaḥ | yadimāmamānuṣīmasyākṛtimantaḥsamārūḍhaprītirasanisyandavistāritena kutūhalottānitena locanayugalenānivāritāḥ paśyāmaḥ | saphalā nodya jātā janmavattā | sarvathā namosmai rūpāntaradhāriṇe bhagavate candrāpīḍacchadmane puṇḍarīkekṣaṇāya | iti vadannāracitapraṇāmāñjalirnagaralokaḥ praṇanāma | sarvataśca samupāvṛtakapāṭapuṭaprakaṭavātāyanasahasratayā candrāpīḍadarśanakutūhalānnagaramapi samunmīlitalocananivahamivābhavat | anantaraṃ ca samāptasakalavidyo vidyāgṛhānnirgatoyamāgacchati candrāpīḍa iti samākarṇyālokanakutūhalinyaḥ sarvasminneva nagare sasaṃbhramamutsṛṣṭārdhaparisamāptaprasādhanavyāpārāḥ kāścidvāmakaratalagatadarpaṇāḥ sphuritasakalarajanikaramaṇḍalā iva paurṇamāsīrajanyaḥ kāścidārdrālaktakarasapāṭalitacaraṇapuṭāḥ kamalaparipītabālātapā iva nalinyaḥ kāścitsasaṃbhramagativigalitamekhalākalāpākulitacaraṇakisalayāḥ śṛṅkhalāsaṃdānamandamandasaṃcāriṇya iva kariṇyaḥ kāścijjaladharasamayadivasaśriya ivendrāyudharāgarucirāmbaradhāriṇyaḥ kāścidullasitadhavalanakhamayūkhapallavānnūpuraravākṛṣṭagṛhakalahaṃsakāniva caraṇapuṭānudvahantyaḥ kāścitkaratalasthitasthūlahārayaṣṭayo ratimiva madanavināśaśokagṛhītasphaṭikākṣavalayāṃ viḍambayantyaḥ kāścitpayodharāntarālagalitamuktālatāstanuvimalasrotojalāntaritacakravākamithunā iva pradoṣaśriyaḥ kāścinnūpuramaṇisamutthitendrāyudhatayā paricayānugatagṛhamayūrikā iva virājantyaḥ kāścidardhapītojjhitamaṇicaṣakāḥ sphuritarāgairmadhurasamivādharapallavaiḥ kṣarantyo harmyatalāni lalanāḥ samāruruhuḥ | anyāśca marakatavātāyanavivaravinirgatamukhamaṇḍalā vikacakamalakośapuṭāmambaratalasaṃcāriṇīṃ kamalinīmiva darśayantyo dadṛśuḥ |

83,21

udapādi ca sahasā sarabhasasaṃcalanajanmā madhurasāraṇāsphālita-<83,22>
vīṇāravakolāhalabahalo rasanāravāhūtagṛhasārasarasitasaṃbhinnaḥ skhali-<83,23>
tacaraṇatalatāḍitasopānajātagambhīradhvaniprahṛṣṭānāmavarodhaśikhaṇḍināṃ <84,1>
kekāravairanugamyamāno navajaladhararavabhayacakitakalahaṃsakolāhalakoma-<84,2>
lo makaradhvajavijayaghoṣaṇānukārī parasparavighaṭṭanāraṇitatāratarahāra-<84,3>
maṇīnāṃ ramaṇīnāṃ śrotrahārī harmyakukṣiṣu pratiravanihrādī bhūṣaṇaninādaḥ | <84,4>

udapādi ca sahasā sarabhasasaṃcalanajanmā madhurasāraṇāsphālitavīṇāravakolāhalabahalo rasanāravāhūtagṛhasārasarasitasaṃbhinnaḥ skhalitacaraṇatalatāḍitasopānajātagambhīradhvaniprahṛṣṭānāmavarodhaśikhaṇḍināṃ kekāravairanugamyamāno navajaladhararavabhayacakitakalahaṃsakolāhalakomalo makaradhvajavijayaghoṣaṇānukārī parasparavighaṭṭanāraṇitatāratarahāramaṇīnāṃ ramaṇīnāṃ śrotrahārī harmyakukṣiṣu pratiravanihrādī bhūṣaṇaninādaḥ |

84,4

muhūrtādiva yuvatijananirantaratayā nārīmayā iva prāsādāḥ sāla-<84,5>
ktakapadakamalavinyāsaiḥ pallavamayamiva kṣititalamaṅganānāmaṅgaprabhāpra-<84,6>
vāheṇa lāvaṇyamayamiva nagaramānanamaṇḍalanivahena candrabimbamayamiva <84,7>
gaganatalamātapanivāraṇāyottānitakaratalajālakena kamalavanamayamiva <84,8>
dikcakravālamābharaṇāṃśukalāpenendrāyudhamaya ivātapo locanamayūkhale-<84,9>
khāsaṃtānena nīlotpaladalamaya iva divaso babhūva | kautukaprasārita-<84,10>
niścalalocanānāṃ ca paśyantīnāṃ tāsāmādarśamayānīva salilamayānīva <84,11>
sphaṭikamayānīva hṛdayāni viveśa candrāpīḍākṛtiḥ | <84,12>

muhūrtādiva yuvatijananirantaratayā nārīmayā iva prāsādāḥ sālaktakapadakamalavinyāsaiḥ pallavamayamiva kṣititalamaṅganānāmaṅgaprabhāpravāheṇa lāvaṇyamayamiva nagaramānanamaṇḍalanivahena candrabimbamayamiva gaganatalamātapanivāraṇāyottānitakaratalajālakena kamalavanamayamiva dikcakravālamābharaṇāṃśukalāpenendrāyudhamaya ivātapo locanamayūkhalekhāsaṃtānena nīlotpaladalamaya iva divaso babhūva | kautukaprasāritaniścalalocanānāṃ ca paśyantīnāṃ tāsāmādarśamayānīva salilamayānīva sphaṭikamayānīva hṛdayāni viveśa candrāpīḍākṛtiḥ |

84,12

āvirbhūtamadanarasānāṃ cānyonyataḥ saparihāsāḥ saviśrambhāḥ <84,13>
sasaṃbhramāḥ serṣyāḥ sotprāsāḥ sābhyasūyāḥ savilāsāḥ samanmathāḥ <84,14>
saspṛhāśca tatkṣaṇaṃ ramaṇīyāḥ prasasrurālāpāḥ | tathā hi | tvaritaga-<84,15>
mane māmapi pratipālaya | darśanonmatte gṛhāṇottarīyam | ullā-<84,16>
sayālakalatāmānanāvalambinīṃ mūḍhe | candralekhāmupāharopahārakusu-<84,17>
maskhalitacaraṇā patasi madanāndhe | saṃyamaya madaniścetane keśa-<84,18>
pāśam | utkṣipa candrāpīḍadarśanavyasanini kāñcīdāmakam | u-<84,19>
tsarpaya pāpe kapoladolāyitaṃ karṇapallavam | ahṛdaye gṛhāṇa nipa-<84,20>
titaṃ dantapattram | yauvanonmatte vilokyase janena sthagaya payodhara-<84,21>
bhāram | apagatalajje śithilībhūtamākalaya dukūlam | alīkamu-<84,22>
gdhe drutataramāgamyatām | kutūhalini dehi darśanāntaram | asaṃtuṣṭe <84,23>
kiyadālokayase | taralahṛdaye parijanamapekṣasva | piśāci gali-<85,1>
tottarīyā hasyase janena | rāgāvṛtanayane paśyasi na sakhījanam | <85,2>
anekabhaṅgivikārapūrṇe duḥkhamakāraṇāyāsitahṛdayā jīvasi | mi-<85,3>
thyāvinīte kiṃ vyapadeśavīkṣitairviśrabdhamālokaya | yauvanaśālini kiṃ <85,4>
pīḍayasi payodharabhāreṇa | atikopane purato bhava | matsariṇi ki-<85,5>
mekākinī ruṇatsi vātāyanam | anaṅgaparavaśe madīyamuttarīyāṃśu-<85,6>
kamuttarīyatāṃ nayasi | rāgāsavamatte nivārayātmānam | ujjhi-<85,7>
tadhairye kiṃ dhāvasi gurujanasamakṣam | ullasatsvabhāve kimevamāku-<85,8>
lībhavasi | mugdhe nigūhasva madanajvarajanitapulakajālakam | asā-<85,9>
dhvācaraṇe kimevamuttāmyasi | bahuvikāre vividhāṅgabhaṅgavalanāyā-<85,10>
sitamadhyabhāgā vṛthā khidyase | śūnyahṛdaye svabhavanānnirgatamapi nā-<85,11>
tmānamavagacchasi | kautukāviṣṭe vismṛtāsi niśvasitum | antaḥ-<85,12>
saṃkalparacitaratasamāgamasukharasanimīlitalocane samunmīlaya loca-<85,13>
nayugalamatikrāmatyayam | anaṅgaśaraprahāramūrchite ravikiraṇanivāra-<85,14>
ṇāya kuru śirasyuttarīyāṃśukapallavam | ayi satīvratagrahagṛhīte <85,15>
draṣṭavyamapaśyantī vañcayasi locanayugalam | adhanye hatāsi parapu-<85,16>
ruṣadarśanaparihāravratena | prasīdottiṣṭha sakhi paśya rativirahitaṃ sā-<85,17>
kṣādiva bhagavantamagṛhītamakaradhvajaṃ makaradhvajam | ayamasya si-<85,18>
tātapatrāntareṇālikulanīle śirasi timiraśaṅkānipatita iva śaśi-<85,19>
karakalāpo mālatīkusumaśekharobhilakṣyate | etadasya karṇābharaṇamara-<85,20>
kataprabhāśyāmāyitamuparacitavikacaśirīṣakusumakarṇapūramiva kapola-<85,21>
talamābhāti | ayamasya hārāntarniviṣṭāruṇamaṇikiraṇakalāpacchalena <85,22>
hṛdayaṃ vivikṣurabhinavayauvanarāga iva bahiḥ parisphurati | etadanena <85,23>
cāmarakalāpāntarairita eva vīkṣitam | etatkimapi vaiśampāyanena saha <86,1>
samāmantrya daśanamayūkhalekhādhavalīkṛtadikcakravālaṃ hasitam | eṣo-<86,2>
sya śukapakṣatiharitarāgeṇottarīyāṃśukaprāntena balāhakasturaṃgakhuraca-<86,3>
lanajanmānamālagnamagrakeśeṣu reṇumapaharati | ayamanena lakṣmīkara-<86,4>
kamalakomalatalaḥ samutkṣipya tiryakturaṃgamaskandhe nikṣiptaścaraṇapallavaḥ | <86,5>
salīlamayamanena ca tāmbūlayācanārthamuttānitatalo dīrghāṅgulirātāmra-<86,6>
puṣkarakośaśobhī gajeneva śaivālakavalagrāsalālasaḥ prasāritaḥ karaḥ | <86,7>
dhanyā sā yā lakṣmīriva nirjitakamalaṃ karatalamasya vasuṃdharāsapa-<86,8>
tnī grahīṣyati | dhanyā ca devī vilāsavatī sakalamahīmaṇḍalabhāra-<86,9>
dhāraṇakṣamaḥ kakubhā diggaja iva garbheṇa yayāyaṃ vyūḍhaḥ | <86,10>

āvirbhūtamadanarasānāṃ cānyonyataḥ saparihāsāḥ saviśrambhāḥ sasaṃbhramāḥ serṣyāḥ sotprāsāḥ sābhyasūyāḥ savilāsāḥ samanmathāḥ saspṛhāśca tatkṣaṇaṃ ramaṇīyāḥ prasasrurālāpāḥ | tathā hi | tvaritagamane māmapi pratipālaya | darśanonmatte gṛhāṇottarīyam | ullāsayālakalatāmānanāvalambinīṃ mūḍhe | candralekhāmupāharopahārakusumaskhalitacaraṇā patasi madanāndhe | saṃyamaya madaniścetane keśapāśam | utkṣipa candrāpīḍadarśanavyasanini kāñcīdāmakam | utsarpaya pāpe kapoladolāyitaṃ karṇapallavam | ahṛdaye gṛhāṇa nipatitaṃ dantapattram | yauvanonmatte vilokyase janena sthagaya payodharabhāram | apagatalajje śithilībhūtamākalaya dukūlam | alīkamugdhe drutataramāgamyatām | kutūhalini dehi darśanāntaram | asaṃtuṣṭe kiyadālokayase | taralahṛdaye parijanamapekṣasva | piśāci galitottarīyā hasyase janena | rāgāvṛtanayane paśyasi na sakhījanam | anekabhaṅgivikārapūrṇe duḥkhamakāraṇāyāsitahṛdayā jīvasi | mithyāvinīte kiṃ vyapadeśavīkṣitairviśrabdhamālokaya | yauvanaśālini kiṃ pīḍayasi payodharabhāreṇa | atikopane purato bhava | matsariṇi kimekākinī ruṇatsi vātāyanam | anaṅgaparavaśe madīyamuttarīyāṃśukamuttarīyatāṃ nayasi | rāgāsavamatte nivārayātmānam | ujjhitadhairye kiṃ dhāvasi gurujanasamakṣam | ullasatsvabhāve kimevamākulībhavasi | mugdhe nigūhasva madanajvarajanitapulakajālakam | asādhvācaraṇe kimevamuttāmyasi | bahuvikāre vividhāṅgabhaṅgavalanāyāsitamadhyabhāgā vṛthā khidyase | śūnyahṛdaye svabhavanānnirgatamapi nātmānamavagacchasi | kautukāviṣṭe vismṛtāsi niśvasitum | antaḥsaṃkalparacitaratasamāgamasukharasanimīlitalocane samunmīlaya locanayugalamatikrāmatyayam | anaṅgaśaraprahāramūrchite ravikiraṇanivāraṇāya kuru śirasyuttarīyāṃśukapallavam | ayi satīvratagrahagṛhīte draṣṭavyamapaśyantī vañcayasi locanayugalam | adhanye hatāsi parapuruṣadarśanaparihāravratena | prasīdottiṣṭha sakhi paśya rativirahitaṃ sākṣādiva bhagavantamagṛhītamakaradhvajaṃ makaradhvajam | ayamasya sitātapatrāntareṇālikulanīle śirasi timiraśaṅkānipatita iva śaśikarakalāpo mālatīkusumaśekharobhilakṣyate | etadasya karṇābharaṇamarakataprabhāśyāmāyitamuparacitavikacaśirīṣakusumakarṇapūramiva kapolatalamābhāti | ayamasya hārāntarniviṣṭāruṇamaṇikiraṇakalāpacchalena hṛdayaṃ vivikṣurabhinavayauvanarāga iva bahiḥ parisphurati | etadanena cāmarakalāpāntarairita eva vīkṣitam | etatkimapi vaiśampāyanena saha samāmantrya daśanamayūkhalekhādhavalīkṛtadikcakravālaṃ hasitam | eṣosya śukapakṣatiharitarāgeṇottarīyāṃśukaprāntena balāhakasturaṃgakhuracalanajanmānamālagnamagrakeśeṣu reṇumapaharati | ayamanena lakṣmīkarakamalakomalatalaḥ samutkṣipya tiryakturaṃgamaskandhe nikṣiptaścaraṇapallavaḥ | salīlamayamanena ca tāmbūlayācanārthamuttānitatalo dīrghāṅgulirātāmrapuṣkarakośaśobhī gajeneva śaivālakavalagrāsalālasaḥ prasāritaḥ karaḥ | dhanyā sā yā lakṣmīriva nirjitakamalaṃ karatalamasya vasuṃdharāsapatnī grahīṣyati | dhanyā ca devī vilāsavatī sakalamahīmaṇḍalabhāradhāraṇakṣamaḥ kakubhā diggaja iva garbheṇa yayāyaṃ vyūḍhaḥ |

86,10

ityevaṃvidhāni cānyāni ca vadantīnāṃ tāsāmāpīyamāna iva lo-<86,11>
canapuṭairāhūyamāna iva bhūṣaṇaravairanugamyamāna iva hṛdayairnibadhyamāna i-<86,12>
vābharaṇaratnaraśmirajjubhirupahriyamāṇa iva navayauvanabalibhiḥ śithi-<86,13>
labhujalatāvigalitadhavalavalayanikaraiḥ pade pade vivāhānala iva kusu-<86,14>
mamiśrairlājāñjalibhiravakīryamāṇaścandrāpīḍo rājakulasamīpamāsa-<86,15>
sāda | krameṇa ca yāmāvasthitābhiranavaratakaraṭasthalagalitamadamasī-<86,16>
paṅkakarībhirañjanagirimālāmalinābhiḥ kuñjaraghaṭābhirandhakāritadi-<86,17>
ṅmukhatayā jaladharadivasāyamānamuddaṇḍadhavalātapatrasahasrasaṃkaṭamaneka-<86,18>
dvīpāntarāgatadūtaśatasamākulaṃ rājadvāramāsādya turaṃgamādavatatāra | <86,19>

ityevaṃvidhāni cānyāni ca vadantīnāṃ tāsāmāpīyamāna iva locanapuṭairāhūyamāna iva bhūṣaṇaravairanugamyamāna iva hṛdayairnibadhyamāna ivābharaṇaratnaraśmirajjubhirupahriyamāṇa iva navayauvanabalibhiḥ śithilabhujalatāvigalitadhavalavalayanikaraiḥ pade pade vivāhānala iva kusumamiśrairlājāñjalibhiravakīryamāṇaścandrāpīḍo rājakulasamīpamāsasāda | krameṇa ca yāmāvasthitābhiranavaratakaraṭasthalagalitamadamasīpaṅkakarībhirañjanagirimālāmalinābhiḥ kuñjaraghaṭābhirandhakāritadiṅmukhatayā jaladharadivasāyamānamuddaṇḍadhavalātapatrasahasrasaṃkaṭamanekadvīpāntarāgatadūtaśatasamākulaṃ rājadvāramāsādya turaṃgamādavatatāra |

86,19

avatīrya ca karatalena kare vaiśampāyanamavalambya puraḥ savinayaṃ <86,20>
prasthitena balāhakenopadiśyamānamārgastribhuvanamiva puñjībhūtamāgṛhī-<86,21>
takanakavetralataiḥ sitavāravāṇadhāribhiḥ sitāṅgarāgaiḥ sitakusumaśe-<86,22>
kharaiḥ sitoṣṇīṣaiḥ sitaveṣaparigrahatayā śvetadvīpasaṃbhavairiva kṛtayugapuru-<86,23>
ṣairiva mahāpramāṇairdivāniśamālikhitairivotkīrṇairiva toraṇastambhaniṣa-<87,1>
ṇṇairdvārapālairanujjhitadvāradeśamanekasaṃjavanacandraśālikāviṭaṅkavedikā-<87,2>
saṃkaṭaśikharairabhraṃkaṣairapahasitakailāsaśailaśobhairamalasudhāvadātaiḥ saprā-<87,3>
leyaśailamiva mahāprāsādairanekavātāyanavivaravinirgatayuvatibhūṣaṇa-<87,4>
kiraṇasahasratayā kanakaśṛṅkhalājālakenevopari vitatena virāja-<87,5>
mānamantargatāyudhanivahābhirāśīviṣakulasaṃkulābhiḥ pātālaguhābhiri-<87,6>
vātigambhīrābhirāyudhaśālābhirupetamabalācaraṇālaktakarasaraktamaṇi-<87,7>
śakalaiḥ śikharanilīnaśikhikulakṛtakekāravakalakalaiḥ krīḍāparvata-<87,8>
kairupaśobhitamujjvalavarṇakambalāvaguṇṭhitakanakaparyāṇābhiḥ pralambacā-<87,9>
marakalāpacumbitacalakarṇapallavābhiḥ kulayuvatibhirivoparūḍhaśikṣā-<87,10>
vinayanibhṛtābhiryāmakareṇukābhiraśūnyakakṣāntaramālānastambhaniṣaṇṇena <87,11>
navajaladharaghoṣagambhīramanugatavīṇāveṇuravaramyamāsphālitaghargharikāghargha-<87,12>
ramanavaratasaṃgītamṛdaṅgadhvanimāmīlitalocanatribhāgeṇa vāmadaśanakoṭi-<87,13>
niṣaṇṇahastena niścalakarṇatālenākarṇayatā salīlamubhayapārśvāvalambi-<87,14>
varṇakambalatayā vindhyagiriṇevāviṣkṛtadhātuvicitritapakṣasaṃpuṭenādhora-<87,15>
ṇagītānandakṛtamandrakaṇṭhagarjitena madajalaśabalaśaṅkhaśobhitaśravaṇapuṭe-<87,16>
na rajanikarabimbacumbisaṃvartakāmbudavṛndaviḍambakena karṇāvalambinā <87,17>
kāñcanamayena kṛtakarṇapūramivāṅkuśena mukhamudvahatā madajalamalinena <87,18>
dvitīyeneva karṇacāmareṇa kapolataladolāyamānena madhukarakulenālaṃkri-<87,19>
yamāṇenātyudagratayā pūrvakāyasyātivāmanatayā ca jaghanabhāgasya pā-<87,20>
tālādiva uttiṣṭhatā niśāsamayeneva parisphuratsārdhacandranakṣatramālena <87,21>
śaradārambheṇeva prakaṭitāruṇacārupuṣkareṇa vāmanarūpeṇeva kṛtatripadīvi-<87,22>
lāsena sphaṭikagiritaṭeneva lagnasiṃhamukhapratimena prasādhitenevālo-<87,23>
lakarṇapallavāhatamukhena gandhamādananāmnā gandhahastinā sanāthīkṛtai-<88,1>
kadeśamujjvalapaṭṭakambalapaṭaprāvāritapṛṣṭhaiśca rasitamadhuraghaṇṭikāravamu-<88,2>
kharakaṇṭhairmañjiṣṭhālohitaskandhakesaravālapallavairvanagajarudhirapāṭalasaṭai-<88,3>
riva kesaribhiḥ puronihitayavasarāśiśikharopaviṣṭamandurāpālairāsanna-<88,4>
maṅgalagītadhvanidattakarṇairantaḥkapoladhṛtamadhurasalavalulitalājakavalairbhū-<88,5>
pālavallabhairmandurāgataisturaṃgamairudbhāsitamadhikaraṇamaṇḍapagataiścāryaveṣaira-<88,6>
tyuccavetrāsanopaviṣṭairdharmamayairiva dharmādhikāribhirmahāpuruṣairadhiṣṭhitama-<88,7>
dhigatasakalagrāmanagaranāmabhirekabhavanamiva jagadakhilamālokayadbhirā-<88,8>
likhitasakalabhuvanavyāpāratayā dharmarājanagaravyatikaramiva darśayadbhi-<88,9>
radhikaraṇalekhakairālikhyamānaśāsanasahasramabhyantarāvasthitanarapatini-<88,10>
rgamapratīkṣaṇapareṇa ca sthānasthāneṣu baddhamaṇḍalena kanakamayārdhacandra-<88,11>
tārāgaṇaśataśabalaiścarmaphalakairniśāsamayamiva darśayatā sphuritaniśi-<88,12>
takaravālakaraprarohakarālitātapenaikaśravaṇapuṭaghaṭitadhavaladantapattreṇo-<88,13>
rdhvabaddhamaulikalāpena dhavalacandanasthāsakakhacitabhujorudaṇḍena baddhā-<88,14>
sidhenukenāndhradraviḍasiṃhalaprāyeṇa sevakajanenāsthānamaṇḍapagatena ca ya-<88,15>
thocitāsanopaviṣṭena prasārayatā durodarakrīḍāmabhyasyatāṣṭāpadavyāpā-<88,16>
ramāsphālayatā parivādinīmālikhatā citraphalake bhūmipālapratibimba-<88,17>
mābadhnatā kāvyagoṣṭhīmātanvatā parihāsakathāṃ vindatā bindumatīṃ ci-<88,18>
ntayatā prahelikāṃ bhāvayatā narapatikṛtakāvyasubhāṣitāni paṭhatā dvi-<88,19>
padīṃ gṛhṇatā kaviguṇānutkiratā pattrabhaṅgānālapatā vāravilāsinīja-<88,20>
namākarṇayatā vaitālikagītamanekasahasrasaṃkhyena dhavaloṣṇīṣapaṭāśliṣṭa-<88,21>
vikaṭakirīṭasaṃkaṭaśirasā sanirjharaśikharālagnabālātapamaṇḍaleneva ku-<88,22>
laparvatacakravālena mūrdhābhiṣiktena sāmantalokenādhiṣṭhitamāsthānotthi-<88,23>
tabhūmipālasaṃvartitānāṃ ca kuthānāṃ ratnāsanānāṃ ca rāśibhiranekavarṇai-<89,1>
rindrāyudhapuñjairiva virājitasabhāparyantamamalamaṇibhūmisaṃkrāntamu-<89,2>
khanivahapratibimbatayā vikacakamalapuṣpaprakaramiva saṃpādayatā gativa-<89,3>
śaraṇitanūpurapārihāryarasanāsvanamukhareṇa skandhāvasaktakanakadaṇḍacā-<89,4>
mareṇa nirgacchatā praviśatā cānavarataṃ vāravilāsinījanenākulita-<89,5>
mekadeśaniṣaṇṇacāmīkaraśṛṅkhalāsaṃyataśvagaṇamitastataḥpracalitaparicitā-<89,6>
mitakastūrikākuraṅgaparimalavāsitadiṅmukhamanekakubjakirātavarṣavaraba-<89,7>
dhiravāmanakamūkasaṃkulamupāhṛtakiṃnaramithunamānītavanamānuṣamābaddhameṣa-<89,8>
kukkuṭakurarakapiñjalalāvakavartikāyuddhamutkūjitacakorakādambahārīta-<89,9>
kokilamālapyamānaśukasārikamibhapatimadaparimalāmarṣajṛmbhitaiśca ni-<89,10>
ṣkūjadbhiḥ śikhariṇāṃ jīvitairiva giriguhānivāsibhirgṛhītaiḥ pañjara-<89,11>
kesaribhirudbhāsyamānamuttrāsyamānaiḥ kāñcanabhavanaprabhājanitadāvānalaśa-<89,12>
ṅkairlolatārakairbhramadbhirbhavanahariṇakadambakairlocanaprabhayā śabalīkṛtadi-<89,13>
gantaramuddāmakekāravānumīyamānamarakatakuṭṭimasthitaśikhaṇḍimaṇḍalama-<89,14>
tiśiśiracandanaviṭapicchāyāniṣaṇṇanidrāyamāṇagṛhasārasamantaḥpureṇa <89,15>
ca bālikājanaprastutakandukapañcālikākrīḍenānavaratasaṃvāhyamānado-<89,16>
lāśikharakvaṇitaghaṇṭāṭaṃkārapūritāśāmukhena bhujaganirmokaśaṅkitamayū-<89,17>
rahriyamāṇahāreṇa saudhaśikharāvatīrṇapracalitapārāvatakulatayā sthalo-<89,18>
tpalinīvanaśobhitenevāntaḥpurikājanaprastutanarapaticaritaviḍambanakrī-<89,19>
ḍenāśvamandurāparibhraṣṭāgatairavaluptabhavanadāḍimīphalairākhaṇḍitāṅgaṇasaha-<89,20>
kārapallavairabhibhūtakubjavāmanakirātakaratalācchinnāni bhūṣaṇāni viki-<89,21>
radbhiḥ kapibhirākulīkṛtena śukasārikāprakāśitasurataviśrambhālāpa-<89,22>
lajjitāvarodhajanena prāsādasopānasamārohaṇacalitairabalānāṃ caraṇāva-<89,23>
saktairmaṇimayaiḥ pade pade raṇadbhistulākoṭivalayairdviguṇīkṛtakūjitarutā-<90,1>
bhirbhavanakalahaṃsamālābhirdhavalitāṅgaṇena dhṛtadhautadhavaladukūlottarīyaiḥ <90,2>
kaladhautadaṇḍāvalambibhiḥ palitapāṇḍuramaulibhirādhāramayairiva maryā-<90,3>
dāmayairiva maṅgalamayairiva gambhīrākṛtibhiḥ svabhāvadhīrairuṣṇīṣibhirva-<90,4>
yaḥpariṇāmepi jaratsiṃhairivāparityaktasattvāvaṣṭambhaiḥ kañcukibhiradhi-<90,5>
ṣṭhitena samupetābhyantaraṃ jaladharasanāthamiva kṛṣṇāgurudhūmapaṭalaiḥ sa-<90,6>
nīhāramiva yāmakuñjaraghaṭākarasīkaraiḥ saniśamiva tamālavīthikā-<90,7>
ndhakāraiḥ sabālātapamiva raktāśokaiḥ satārāgaṇamiva muktākalā-<90,8>
paiḥ savarṣāsamayamiva dhārāgṛhaiḥ sataḍillatamiva hemamayībhirmayūraya-<90,9>
ṣṭibhiḥ sagṛhadaivatamiva śālabhañjikābhiḥ śivabhavanamiva dvārāva-<90,10>
sthitadaṇḍapāṇipratīhāragaṇamutkṛṣṭakavigadyamiva vividhavarṇaśreṇipratipā-<90,11>
dyamānābhinavārthasaṃcayamapsarogaṇamiva prakaṭamanoramārambhaṃ divasaka-<90,12>
rodayamivollasatpadmākarakamalāmodamuṣṇakiraṇamiva nijalakṣmīkṛta-<90,13>
kamalopakāraṃ nāṭakamiva prakaṭapatākāṅkaśobhitaṃ śoṇitapuramiva <90,14>
bāṇayogyāvāsopetaṃ purāṇamiva yathāvibhāgāvasthāpitasakalabhuvanako-<90,15>
śaṃ saṃpūrṇacandrodayamiva mṛdukarasahasrasaṃvardhitaratnālayaṃ diggajami-<90,16>
vāvicchinnamahādānasaṃtānaṃ brahmāṇḍamiva sakalajīvalokavyavahārakā-<90,17>
raṇotpannahiraṇyagarbhamīśānabāhuvanamiva mahābhogimaṇḍalasahasrādhiṣṭhita-<90,18>
prakoṣṭhaṃ mahābhāratamivānantagītākarṇanānanditanaraṃ yaduvaṃśamiva ku-<90,19>
lakramāgataśūrabhīmapuruṣottamabalaparipālitaṃ vyākaraṇamiva prathamama-<90,20>
dhyamottamapuruṣavibhaktisthitānekādeśakārakākhyātasaṃpradānakriyāvyaya-<90,21>
prapañcasusthitamudadhimiva bhayāntaḥpraviṣṭasapakṣabhūmibhṛtsahasrasaṃkulamuṣā-<90,22>
niruddhasamāgamamiva citralekhādarśitavicitrasakalatribhuvanākāraṃ ba-<90,23>
liyajñamiva purāṇapuruṣavāmanādhiṣṭhitābhyantaraṃ śuklapakṣapradoṣamiva vi-<91,1>
tataśaśikiraṇakalāpadhavalāmbaravitānaṃ naravāhanadattacaritamivāntaḥ-<91,2>
saṃvardhitapriyadarśanarājadārikāgandharvadattotkaṇṭhaṃ mahātīrthamiva sadyo-<91,3>
nekapuruṣaprāptābhiṣekaphalaṃ prāgvaṃśamiva nānāsavapātrasaṃkulaṃ niśāsa-<91,4>
mayamivānekanakṣatramālālaṃkṛtaṃ prabhātasamayamiva pūrvadigbhāgarāgānu-<91,5>
meyamitrodayaṃ gāndhikabhavanamiva snānadhūpavilepanavarṇakojjvalaṃ tā-<91,6>
mbūlikabhavanamiva kṛtalavalīlavaṅgailākaṅkolapattrasaṃcayaṃ prathamaveśyā-<91,7>
samāgamamivāviditahṛdayābhiprāyaceṣṭāvikāraṃ kāmukajanamiva bahu-<91,8>
cāṭusaṃlāpasubhāṣitarasāsvādadattatālaśabdaṃ dhūrtamaṃḍalamiva dīyamā-<91,9>
namaṇiśatasahasrālaṃkaraṇakṛtalekhyapattrasaṃcayaṃ dharmārambhamivāśeṣajana-<91,10>
manaḥprahlādanaṃ mahāvanamiva vividhaśvāpadadvijopaghuṣṭaṃ rāmāyaṇamiva <91,11>
kapikathāsamākulaṃ mādrīkulamiva nakulālaṃkṛtaṃ saṃgītabhavanamivā-<91,12>
nekasthānāvasthāpitamṛdaṅgaṃ raghukulamiva bharataguṇānanditaṃ jyotiṣa-<91,13>
miva grahamokṣakalābhāganipuṇaṃ nāradīyamivāvarṇyamānarājadharmaṃ ya-<91,14>
ntramiva vividhaśabdarasalabdhāsvādaṃ mṛdukāvyamivānyacintitasva-<91,15>
bhāvābhiprāyāvedakaṃ mahānadīpravāhamiva sarvaduritāpaharaṃ dhanamiva na <91,16>
kasyacinna kāṅkṣaṇīyaṃ saṃdhyāsamayamiva dṛśyamānacandrāpīḍodayaṃ nā-<91,17>
rāyaṇavakṣaḥsthalamiva śrīratnaprabhābhāsitadigantaṃ balabhadramiva kādamba-<91,18>
rīrasaviśeṣavarṇanākulamati brāhmaṇamiva padmāsanopadeśadarśitabhūma-<91,19>
ṇḍalaṃ skandamiva śikhikrīḍārambhacañcalaṃ kulāṅganāpracāramiva sa-<91,20>
rvadopajātaśaṅkaṃ veśyājanamivopacāracaturaṃ durjanamivāpagataparalo-<91,21>
kabhayamantyajajanamivāgamyaviṣayābhilāṣamagamyaviṣayāsaktamapi pra-<91,22>
śaṃsanīyamantakabhaṭagaṇamiva kṛtākṛtasukṛtavicāranipuṇaṃ sukṛtamivā-<91,23>
dimadhyāvasānakalyāṇakaraṃ vāsarārambhamiva parisphuratpadmarāgāruṇī-<92,1>
kriyamāṇaniśāntaṃ divyamunigaṇamiva kalāpisanāthaśvetaketuśobhitaṃ <92,2>
bhāratasamaramiva kṛtavarmaśilīmukhacakrasaṃbhārabhīṣaṇaṃ pātālamiva ma-<92,3>
hākañcukisahasrādhyāsitaṃ varṣaparvatasamūhamivāntaḥsthitāparimāṇaśṛ-<92,4>
ṅgihemakūṭaṃ mahādvāramapi duṣpraveśamavantiviṣayagatamapi māgadhajanā-<92,5>
dhiṣṭhitaṃ sphītamapi bhramannagnalokaṃ rājakulaṃ viveśa | <92,6>

avatīrya ca karatalena kare vaiśampāyanamavalambya puraḥ savinayaṃ prasthitena balāhakenopadiśyamānamārgastribhuvanamiva puñjībhūtamāgṛhītakanakavetralataiḥ sitavāravāṇadhāribhiḥ sitāṅgarāgaiḥ sitakusumaśekharaiḥ sitoṣṇīṣaiḥ sitaveṣaparigrahatayā śvetadvīpasaṃbhavairiva kṛtayugapuruṣairiva mahāpramāṇairdivāniśamālikhitairivotkīrṇairiva toraṇastambhaniṣaṇṇairdvārapālairanujjhitadvāradeśamanekasaṃjavanacandraśālikāviṭaṅkavedikāsaṃkaṭaśikharairabhraṃkaṣairapahasitakailāsaśailaśobhairamalasudhāvadātaiḥ saprāleyaśailamiva mahāprāsādairanekavātāyanavivaravinirgatayuvatibhūṣaṇakiraṇasahasratayā kanakaśṛṅkhalājālakenevopari vitatena virājamānamantargatāyudhanivahābhirāśīviṣakulasaṃkulābhiḥ pātālaguhābhirivātigambhīrābhirāyudhaśālābhirupetamabalācaraṇālaktakarasaraktamaṇiśakalaiḥ śikharanilīnaśikhikulakṛtakekāravakalakalaiḥ krīḍāparvatakairupaśobhitamujjvalavarṇakambalāvaguṇṭhitakanakaparyāṇābhiḥ pralambacāmarakalāpacumbitacalakarṇapallavābhiḥ kulayuvatibhirivoparūḍhaśikṣāvinayanibhṛtābhiryāmakareṇukābhiraśūnyakakṣāntaramālānastambhaniṣaṇṇena navajaladharaghoṣagambhīramanugatavīṇāveṇuravaramyamāsphālitaghargharikāghargharamanavaratasaṃgītamṛdaṅgadhvanimāmīlitalocanatribhāgeṇa vāmadaśanakoṭiniṣaṇṇahastena niścalakarṇatālenākarṇayatā salīlamubhayapārśvāvalambivarṇakambalatayā vindhyagiriṇevāviṣkṛtadhātuvicitritapakṣasaṃpuṭenādhoraṇagītānandakṛtamandrakaṇṭhagarjitena madajalaśabalaśaṅkhaśobhitaśravaṇapuṭena rajanikarabimbacumbisaṃvartakāmbudavṛndaviḍambakena karṇāvalambinā kāñcanamayena kṛtakarṇapūramivāṅkuśena mukhamudvahatā madajalamalinena dvitīyeneva karṇacāmareṇa kapolataladolāyamānena madhukarakulenālaṃkriyamāṇenātyudagratayā pūrvakāyasyātivāmanatayā ca jaghanabhāgasya pātālādiva uttiṣṭhatā niśāsamayeneva parisphuratsārdhacandranakṣatramālena śaradārambheṇeva prakaṭitāruṇacārupuṣkareṇa vāmanarūpeṇeva kṛtatripadīvilāsena sphaṭikagiritaṭeneva lagnasiṃhamukhapratimena prasādhitenevālolakarṇapallavāhatamukhena gandhamādananāmnā gandhahastinā sanāthīkṛtaikadeśamujjvalapaṭṭakambalapaṭaprāvāritapṛṣṭhaiśca rasitamadhuraghaṇṭikāravamukharakaṇṭhairmañjiṣṭhālohitaskandhakesaravālapallavairvanagajarudhirapāṭalasaṭairiva kesaribhiḥ puronihitayavasarāśiśikharopaviṣṭamandurāpālairāsannamaṅgalagītadhvanidattakarṇairantaḥkapoladhṛtamadhurasalavalulitalājakavalairbhūpālavallabhairmandurāgataisturaṃgamairudbhāsitamadhikaraṇamaṇḍapagataiścāryaveṣairatyuccavetrāsanopaviṣṭairdharmamayairiva dharmādhikāribhirmahāpuruṣairadhiṣṭhitamadhigatasakalagrāmanagaranāmabhirekabhavanamiva jagadakhilamālokayadbhirālikhitasakalabhuvanavyāpāratayā dharmarājanagaravyatikaramiva darśayadbhiradhikaraṇalekhakairālikhyamānaśāsanasahasramabhyantarāvasthitanarapatinirgamapratīkṣaṇapareṇa ca sthānasthāneṣu baddhamaṇḍalena kanakamayārdhacandratārāgaṇaśataśabalaiścarmaphalakairniśāsamayamiva darśayatā sphuritaniśitakaravālakaraprarohakarālitātapenaikaśravaṇapuṭaghaṭitadhavaladantapattreṇordhvabaddhamaulikalāpena dhavalacandanasthāsakakhacitabhujorudaṇḍena baddhāsidhenukenāndhradraviḍasiṃhalaprāyeṇa sevakajanenāsthānamaṇḍapagatena ca yathocitāsanopaviṣṭena prasārayatā durodarakrīḍāmabhyasyatāṣṭāpadavyāpāramāsphālayatā parivādinīmālikhatā citraphalake bhūmipālapratibimbamābadhnatā kāvyagoṣṭhīmātanvatā parihāsakathāṃ vindatā bindumatīṃ cintayatā prahelikāṃ bhāvayatā narapatikṛtakāvyasubhāṣitāni paṭhatā dvipadīṃ gṛhṇatā kaviguṇānutkiratā pattrabhaṅgānālapatā vāravilāsinījanamākarṇayatā vaitālikagītamanekasahasrasaṃkhyena dhavaloṣṇīṣapaṭāśliṣṭavikaṭakirīṭasaṃkaṭaśirasā sanirjharaśikharālagnabālātapamaṇḍaleneva kulaparvatacakravālena mūrdhābhiṣiktena sāmantalokenādhiṣṭhitamāsthānotthitabhūmipālasaṃvartitānāṃ ca kuthānāṃ ratnāsanānāṃ ca rāśibhiranekavarṇairindrāyudhapuñjairiva virājitasabhāparyantamamalamaṇibhūmisaṃkrāntamukhanivahapratibimbatayā vikacakamalapuṣpaprakaramiva saṃpādayatā gativaśaraṇitanūpurapārihāryarasanāsvanamukhareṇa skandhāvasaktakanakadaṇḍacāmareṇa nirgacchatā praviśatā cānavarataṃ vāravilāsinījanenākulitamekadeśaniṣaṇṇacāmīkaraśṛṅkhalāsaṃyataśvagaṇamitastataḥpracalitaparicitāmitakastūrikākuraṅgaparimalavāsitadiṅmukhamanekakubjakirātavarṣavarabadhiravāmanakamūkasaṃkulamupāhṛtakiṃnaramithunamānītavanamānuṣamābaddhameṣakukkuṭakurarakapiñjalalāvakavartikāyuddhamutkūjitacakorakādambahārītakokilamālapyamānaśukasārikamibhapatimadaparimalāmarṣajṛmbhitaiśca niṣkūjadbhiḥ śikhariṇāṃ jīvitairiva giriguhānivāsibhirgṛhītaiḥ pañjarakesaribhirudbhāsyamānamuttrāsyamānaiḥ kāñcanabhavanaprabhājanitadāvānalaśaṅkairlolatārakairbhramadbhirbhavanahariṇakadambakairlocanaprabhayā śabalīkṛtadigantaramuddāmakekāravānumīyamānamarakatakuṭṭimasthitaśikhaṇḍimaṇḍalamatiśiśiracandanaviṭapicchāyāniṣaṇṇanidrāyamāṇagṛhasārasamantaḥpureṇa ca bālikājanaprastutakandukapañcālikākrīḍenānavaratasaṃvāhyamānadolāśikharakvaṇitaghaṇṭāṭaṃkārapūritāśāmukhena bhujaganirmokaśaṅkitamayūrahriyamāṇahāreṇa saudhaśikharāvatīrṇapracalitapārāvatakulatayā sthalotpalinīvanaśobhitenevāntaḥpurikājanaprastutanarapaticaritaviḍambanakrīḍenāśvamandurāparibhraṣṭāgatairavaluptabhavanadāḍimīphalairākhaṇḍitāṅgaṇasahakārapallavairabhibhūtakubjavāmanakirātakaratalācchinnāni bhūṣaṇāni vikiradbhiḥ kapibhirākulīkṛtena śukasārikāprakāśitasurataviśrambhālāpalajjitāvarodhajanena prāsādasopānasamārohaṇacalitairabalānāṃ caraṇāvasaktairmaṇimayaiḥ pade pade raṇadbhistulākoṭivalayairdviguṇīkṛtakūjitarutābhirbhavanakalahaṃsamālābhirdhavalitāṅgaṇena dhṛtadhautadhavaladukūlottarīyaiḥ kaladhautadaṇḍāvalambibhiḥ palitapāṇḍuramaulibhirādhāramayairiva maryādāmayairiva maṅgalamayairiva gambhīrākṛtibhiḥ svabhāvadhīrairuṣṇīṣibhirvayaḥpariṇāmepi jaratsiṃhairivāparityaktasattvāvaṣṭambhaiḥ kañcukibhiradhiṣṭhitena samupetābhyantaraṃ jaladharasanāthamiva kṛṣṇāgurudhūmapaṭalaiḥ sanīhāramiva yāmakuñjaraghaṭākarasīkaraiḥ saniśamiva tamālavīthikāndhakāraiḥ sabālātapamiva raktāśokaiḥ satārāgaṇamiva muktākalāpaiḥ savarṣāsamayamiva dhārāgṛhaiḥ sataḍillatamiva hemamayībhirmayūrayaṣṭibhiḥ sagṛhadaivatamiva śālabhañjikābhiḥ śivabhavanamiva dvārāvasthitadaṇḍapāṇipratīhāragaṇamutkṛṣṭakavigadyamiva vividhavarṇaśreṇipratipādyamānābhinavārthasaṃcayamapsarogaṇamiva prakaṭamanoramārambhaṃ divasakarodayamivollasatpadmākarakamalāmodamuṣṇakiraṇamiva nijalakṣmīkṛtakamalopakāraṃ nāṭakamiva prakaṭapatākāṅkaśobhitaṃ śoṇitapuramiva bāṇayogyāvāsopetaṃ purāṇamiva yathāvibhāgāvasthāpitasakalabhuvanakośaṃ saṃpūrṇacandrodayamiva mṛdukarasahasrasaṃvardhitaratnālayaṃ diggajamivāvicchinnamahādānasaṃtānaṃ brahmāṇḍamiva sakalajīvalokavyavahārakāraṇotpannahiraṇyagarbhamīśānabāhuvanamiva mahābhogimaṇḍalasahasrādhiṣṭhitaprakoṣṭhaṃ mahābhāratamivānantagītākarṇanānanditanaraṃ yaduvaṃśamiva kulakramāgataśūrabhīmapuruṣottamabalaparipālitaṃ vyākaraṇamiva prathamamadhyamottamapuruṣavibhaktisthitānekādeśakārakākhyātasaṃpradānakriyāvyayaprapañcasusthitamudadhimiva bhayāntaḥpraviṣṭasapakṣabhūmibhṛtsahasrasaṃkulamuṣāniruddhasamāgamamiva citralekhādarśitavicitrasakalatribhuvanākāraṃ baliyajñamiva purāṇapuruṣavāmanādhiṣṭhitābhyantaraṃ śuklapakṣapradoṣamiva vitataśaśikiraṇakalāpadhavalāmbaravitānaṃ naravāhanadattacaritamivāntaḥsaṃvardhitapriyadarśanarājadārikāgandharvadattotkaṇṭhaṃ mahātīrthamiva sadyonekapuruṣaprāptābhiṣekaphalaṃ prāgvaṃśamiva nānāsavapātrasaṃkulaṃ niśāsamayamivānekanakṣatramālālaṃkṛtaṃ prabhātasamayamiva pūrvadigbhāgarāgānumeyamitrodayaṃ gāndhikabhavanamiva snānadhūpavilepanavarṇakojjvalaṃ tāmbūlikabhavanamiva kṛtalavalīlavaṅgailākaṅkolapattrasaṃcayaṃ prathamaveśyāsamāgamamivāviditahṛdayābhiprāyaceṣṭāvikāraṃ kāmukajanamiva bahucāṭusaṃlāpasubhāṣitarasāsvādadattatālaśabdaṃ dhūrtamaṃḍalamiva dīyamānamaṇiśatasahasrālaṃkaraṇakṛtalekhyapattrasaṃcayaṃ dharmārambhamivāśeṣajanamanaḥprahlādanaṃ mahāvanamiva vividhaśvāpadadvijopaghuṣṭaṃ rāmāyaṇamiva kapikathāsamākulaṃ mādrīkulamiva nakulālaṃkṛtaṃ saṃgītabhavanamivānekasthānāvasthāpitamṛdaṅgaṃ raghukulamiva bharataguṇānanditaṃ jyotiṣamiva grahamokṣakalābhāganipuṇaṃ nāradīyamivāvarṇyamānarājadharmaṃ yantramiva vividhaśabdarasalabdhāsvādaṃ mṛdukāvyamivānyacintitasvabhāvābhiprāyāvedakaṃ mahānadīpravāhamiva sarvaduritāpaharaṃ dhanamiva na kasyacinna kāṅkṣaṇīyaṃ saṃdhyāsamayamiva dṛśyamānacandrāpīḍodayaṃ nārāyaṇavakṣaḥsthalamiva śrīratnaprabhābhāsitadigantaṃ balabhadramiva kādambarīrasaviśeṣavarṇanākulamati brāhmaṇamiva padmāsanopadeśadarśitabhūmaṇḍalaṃ skandamiva śikhikrīḍārambhacañcalaṃ kulāṅganāpracāramiva sarvadopajātaśaṅkaṃ veśyājanamivopacāracaturaṃ durjanamivāpagataparalokabhayamantyajajanamivāgamyaviṣayābhilāṣamagamyaviṣayāsaktamapi praśaṃsanīyamantakabhaṭagaṇamiva kṛtākṛtasukṛtavicāranipuṇaṃ sukṛtamivādimadhyāvasānakalyāṇakaraṃ vāsarārambhamiva parisphuratpadmarāgāruṇīkriyamāṇaniśāntaṃ divyamunigaṇamiva kalāpisanāthaśvetaketuśobhitaṃ bhāratasamaramiva kṛtavarmaśilīmukhacakrasaṃbhārabhīṣaṇaṃ pātālamiva mahākañcukisahasrādhyāsitaṃ varṣaparvatasamūhamivāntaḥsthitāparimāṇaśṛṅgihemakūṭaṃ mahādvāramapi duṣpraveśamavantiviṣayagatamapi māgadhajanādhiṣṭhitaṃ sphītamapi bhramannagnalokaṃ rājakulaṃ viveśa |

92,6

sasaṃbhramopagataiśca kṛtapraṇāmaiḥ pratīhāramaṇḍalairupadiśyamānamārgaḥ <92,7>
sarvataḥ pracalitena ca pūrvakṛtāvasthānena dūraparyastamauliśithilitacū-<92,8>
ḍāmaṇimarīcicumbitavasudhātalena rājalokena pratyekaśaḥ pratīhārani-<92,9>
vedyamānena sādaraṃ praṇamyamānaḥ pade pade cābhyantaravinirgatābhirācā-<92,10>
rakuśalābhirantaḥpuravṛddhābhiḥ kriyamāṇāvataraṇamaṅgalo bhuvanānta-<92,11>
rāṇīva vividhaprāṇisahasrasaṃkulāni saptakakṣāntarāṇyatikramyābhyanta-<92,12>
rāvasthitamanavarataśastragrahaṇaśyāmikālīḍhakaratalaiḥ karacaraṇalocanava-<92,13>
rjamasitalohajālakāvṛtaśarīrairālānastambhairiva gajamadaparimalalo-<92,14>
bhanirantaranilīnamadhukarapaṭalajaṭilaiḥ kulakramāgatairudāttānvayairanu-<92,15>
raktairmahāprāṇatayātikarkaśatayā ca dānavairivāśayākārasaṃbhāvyamānapa-<92,16>
rākramaiḥ sarvataḥ śarīrarakṣādhikāraniyuktaiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛtamubhayato <92,17>
vāravilāsinībhiścānavaratamuddhūyamānadhavalacāmaramamalapulinatalaśobhi-<92,18>
ni surakuñjaramiva mandākinīvāriṇi haṃsadhavalaśayanatale niṣaṇṇaṃ <92,19>
pitaramapaśyat | <92,20>

sasaṃbhramopagataiśca kṛtapraṇāmaiḥ pratīhāramaṇḍalairupadiśyamānamārgaḥ sarvataḥ pracalitena ca pūrvakṛtāvasthānena dūraparyastamauliśithilitacūḍāmaṇimarīcicumbitavasudhātalena rājalokena pratyekaśaḥ pratīhāranivedyamānena sādaraṃ praṇamyamānaḥ pade pade cābhyantaravinirgatābhirācārakuśalābhirantaḥpuravṛddhābhiḥ kriyamāṇāvataraṇamaṅgalo bhuvanāntarāṇīva vividhaprāṇisahasrasaṃkulāni saptakakṣāntarāṇyatikramyābhyantarāvasthitamanavarataśastragrahaṇaśyāmikālīḍhakaratalaiḥ karacaraṇalocanavarjamasitalohajālakāvṛtaśarīrairālānastambhairiva gajamadaparimalalobhanirantaranilīnamadhukarapaṭalajaṭilaiḥ kulakramāgatairudāttānvayairanuraktairmahāprāṇatayātikarkaśatayā ca dānavairivāśayākārasaṃbhāvyamānaparākramaiḥ sarvataḥ śarīrarakṣādhikāraniyuktaiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛtamubhayato vāravilāsinībhiścānavaratamuddhūyamānadhavalacāmaramamalapulinatalaśobhini surakuñjaramiva mandākinīvāriṇi haṃsadhavalaśayanatale niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaramapaśyat |

92,20

ālokayeti ca pratīhāravacanānantaramatidūrāvanatena calitacūḍāma-<92,21>
ṇinā śirasā kṛtapraṇāmamehyehītyabhidadhāno dūrādeva prasāritabhujayu-<92,22>
galaḥ śayanatalādīṣaducchvasitamūrtirānandajalāpūryamāṇalocanaḥ samu-<92,23>
dgatapulakatayā sīvyannivaikīkurvanniva pibanniva taṃ pitā vinayāvanata-<93,1>
māliliṅga | āliṅgitonmuktaśca pituścaraṇapīṭhasamīpe piṇḍīkṛtamutta-<93,2>
rīyamātmatāmbūlakaraṅkavāhinyā satvaramāsanīkṛtamapanayeti śanairvada-<93,3>
nnagracaraṇena samutsārya candrāpīḍaḥ kṣititala eva niṣasāda | ana-<93,4>
ntaranihite cāsyāsane rājñā sutanirviśeṣamupagūḍho vaiśampāyano nya-<93,5>
ṣīdat | muhūrtamiva vismṛtacāmarotkṣepaniścalānāṃ vāravilāsinīnāṃ <93,6>
sābhilāṣairanilacalitakuvalayadaladāmadīrghairājihmataralatārasārairavalu-<93,7>
pyamāna iva dṛṣṭipātaiḥ sthitvā gaccha vatsa putravatsalāṃ mātaramabhivādya <93,8>
darśanalālasā yathākramaṃ sarvā jananīrdarśanenānandayeti visarjitaḥ <93,9>
pitrā savinayamutthāya nivāritaparijano vaiśampāyanadvitīyontaḥpurapra-<93,10>
veśayogyena rājaparijanenopadiśyamānavartmāntaḥpuramāyayau | <93,11>

ālokayeti ca pratīhāravacanānantaramatidūrāvanatena calitacūḍāmaṇinā śirasā kṛtapraṇāmamehyehītyabhidadhāno dūrādeva prasāritabhujayugalaḥ śayanatalādīṣaducchvasitamūrtirānandajalāpūryamāṇalocanaḥ samudgatapulakatayā sīvyannivaikīkurvanniva pibanniva taṃ pitā vinayāvanatamāliliṅga | āliṅgitonmuktaśca pituścaraṇapīṭhasamīpe piṇḍīkṛtamuttarīyamātmatāmbūlakaraṅkavāhinyā satvaramāsanīkṛtamapanayeti śanairvadannagracaraṇena samutsārya candrāpīḍaḥ kṣititala eva niṣasāda | anantaranihite cāsyāsane rājñā sutanirviśeṣamupagūḍho vaiśampāyano nyaṣīdat | muhūrtamiva vismṛtacāmarotkṣepaniścalānāṃ vāravilāsinīnāṃ sābhilāṣairanilacalitakuvalayadaladāmadīrghairājihmataralatārasārairavalupyamāna iva dṛṣṭipātaiḥ sthitvā gaccha vatsa putravatsalāṃ mātaramabhivādya darśanalālasā yathākramaṃ sarvā jananīrdarśanenānandayeti visarjitaḥ pitrā savinayamutthāya nivāritaparijano vaiśampāyanadvitīyontaḥpurapraveśayogyena rājaparijanenopadiśyamānavartmāntaḥpuramāyayau |

93,11

tatra dhavalakañcukāvacchannaśarīrairanekaśatasaṃkhyaiḥ śriyamiva kṣīro-<93,12>
dakallolaiḥ samantātparivṛtāṃ śuddhāntāntarvaṃśikairatipraśāntākārābhi-<93,13>
śca kaṣāyaraktāmbaradhāriṇībhiḥ saṃdhyābhiriva sakalalokavandyābhiḥ pra-<93,14>
lambaśravaṇapāśābhirviditānekakathāvṛttāntābhirbhūtapūrvāḥ puṇyāḥ kathāḥ <93,15>
kathayantībhiritihāsānvācayantībhiḥ pustakāni dadhatībhirdharmopadeśā-<93,16>
nnivedayantībhirjaratpravrajitābhirvinodyamānāmuparacitastrīveṣabhāṣeṇa gṛ-<93,17>
hītavikaṭaprasādhanena varṣadharajanena saṃsevyamānāmanavaratavidhūyamānavā-<93,18>
lavyajanakalāpāmaṅganājanena ca vasanābharaṇakusumapaṭavāsatāmbūlatā-<93,19>
lavṛntāṅgarāgabhṛṅgāradhāriṇā maṇḍalopaviṣṭenopāsyamānāṃ payodharāva-<93,20>
lambitamuktāguṇāmacaladvayamadhyapravṛttagaṅgāpravāhāmiva medinīmāsanna-<93,21>
darpaṇapatitamukhapratibimbāmarkabimbapraviṣṭaśaśimaṇḍalāmiva divaṃ samu-<93,22>
pasṛtya mātaraṃ nanāma | <93,23>

tatra dhavalakañcukāvacchannaśarīrairanekaśatasaṃkhyaiḥ śriyamiva kṣīrodakallolaiḥ samantātparivṛtāṃ śuddhāntāntarvaṃśikairatipraśāntākārābhiśca kaṣāyaraktāmbaradhāriṇībhiḥ saṃdhyābhiriva sakalalokavandyābhiḥ pralambaśravaṇapāśābhirviditānekakathāvṛttāntābhirbhūtapūrvāḥ puṇyāḥ kathāḥ kathayantībhiritihāsānvācayantībhiḥ pustakāni dadhatībhirdharmopadeśānnivedayantībhirjaratpravrajitābhirvinodyamānāmuparacitastrīveṣabhāṣeṇa gṛhītavikaṭaprasādhanena varṣadharajanena saṃsevyamānāmanavaratavidhūyamānavālavyajanakalāpāmaṅganājanena ca vasanābharaṇakusumapaṭavāsatāmbūlatālavṛntāṅgarāgabhṛṅgāradhāriṇā maṇḍalopaviṣṭenopāsyamānāṃ payodharāvalambitamuktāguṇāmacaladvayamadhyapravṛttagaṅgāpravāhāmiva medinīmāsannadarpaṇapatitamukhapratibimbāmarkabimbapraviṣṭaśaśimaṇḍalāmiva divaṃ samupasṛtya mātaraṃ nanāma |

93,23

sā tu taṃ sasaṃbhramamutthāpya satyapyājñāsaṃpādanadakṣe pārśvaparivartini <94,1>
parijane svayameva kṛtāvataraṇakā prasnutapayodharakṣaratpayobinducchalena <94,2>
dravībhūya snehākulena nirgacchateva hṛdayenāntaḥśubhaśatānyabhidhyāyantī <94,3>
mūrdhanyupāghrāya taṃ suciramāśiśleṣa | anantaraṃ ca tathaiva kṛtayathoci-<94,4>
tasamupacāramāśliṣṭavaiśampāyanā svayamupaviśya vinayādavanitale sa-<94,5>
mupaviśantamākṛṣya balādanicchantamapi candrāpīḍamutsaṅgamāropita-<94,6>
vatī | sasaṃbhramaparijanopanītāyāmāsandyāmupaviṣṭe ca vaiśampāyane <94,7>
candrāpīḍaṃ punaḥpunarāliṅgya lalāṭadeśe vakṣasi bhujaśikharayośca mu-<94,8>
hurmuhuḥ karatalena parāmṛśantī vilāsavatī tamavādīt | vatsa kaṭhi-<94,9>
nahṛdayaste pitā yeneyamākṛtirīdṛśī tribhuvanalālanīyā kleśamatimahā-<94,10>
ntamiyantaṃ kālaṃ lambhitā | kathamasi soḍhavānatidīrghāmimāṃ gurujana-<94,11>
yantraṇām | aho bālasyāpi sataḥ kaṭhorasyeva te mahaddhairyam | aho <94,12>
vigalitaśiśujanakrīḍākautukalāghavamarbhake tvayi hṛdayam | aho <94,13>
gurujanasyopari bhaktirasādhāraṇā | sarvathā yathā pituḥ prasādātsama-<94,14>
stābhirupeto vidyābhirālokitosyevamacireṇaiva kālenānurūpābhirvadhūbhi-<94,15>
rupetamālokayiṣyāmi | ityevamabhidhāya lajjāsmitāvanatamātmamukhapra-<94,16>
tibimbagarbhe vikacakamalakṛtakarṇapallavāvataṃsa iva kapole paryacumbade-<94,17>
nam | evaṃ ca tatrāpi nāticirameva sthitvā krameṇa sarvāntaḥpurāṇi da-<94,18>
rśanenānandayāmāsa | nirgatya ca rājakuladvārāvasthitamindrāyudhamāruhya <94,19>
tathaiva tena rājaputralokenānugamyamānaḥ śukanāsaṃ draṣṭumayāsīt | <94,20>

sā tu taṃ sasaṃbhramamutthāpya satyapyājñāsaṃpādanadakṣe pārśvaparivartini parijane svayameva kṛtāvataraṇakā prasnutapayodharakṣaratpayobinducchalena dravībhūya snehākulena nirgacchateva hṛdayenāntaḥśubhaśatānyabhidhyāyantī mūrdhanyupāghrāya taṃ suciramāśiśleṣa | anantaraṃ ca tathaiva kṛtayathocitasamupacāramāśliṣṭavaiśampāyanā svayamupaviśya vinayādavanitale samupaviśantamākṛṣya balādanicchantamapi candrāpīḍamutsaṅgamāropitavatī | sasaṃbhramaparijanopanītāyāmāsandyāmupaviṣṭe ca vaiśampāyane candrāpīḍaṃ punaḥpunarāliṅgya lalāṭadeśe vakṣasi bhujaśikharayośca muhurmuhuḥ karatalena parāmṛśantī vilāsavatī tamavādīt | vatsa kaṭhinahṛdayaste pitā yeneyamākṛtirīdṛśī tribhuvanalālanīyā kleśamatimahāntamiyantaṃ kālaṃ lambhitā | kathamasi soḍhavānatidīrghāmimāṃ gurujanayantraṇām | aho bālasyāpi sataḥ kaṭhorasyeva te mahaddhairyam | aho vigalitaśiśujanakrīḍākautukalāghavamarbhake tvayi hṛdayam | aho gurujanasyopari bhaktirasādhāraṇā | sarvathā yathā pituḥ prasādātsamastābhirupeto vidyābhirālokitosyevamacireṇaiva kālenānurūpābhirvadhūbhirupetamālokayiṣyāmi | ityevamabhidhāya lajjāsmitāvanatamātmamukhapratibimbagarbhe vikacakamalakṛtakarṇapallavāvataṃsa iva kapole paryacumbadenam | evaṃ ca tatrāpi nāticirameva sthitvā krameṇa sarvāntaḥpurāṇi darśanenānandayāmāsa | nirgatya ca rājakuladvārāvasthitamindrāyudhamāruhya tathaiva tena rājaputralokenānugamyamānaḥ śukanāsaṃ draṣṭumayāsīt |

94,20

yāmāvasthitavividhagajaghaṭāsaṃkaṭamanekaturaṃgasahasrasaṃbādhamaparimi-<94,21>
tajanasamūhasahasrasaṃmardasaṃkulamekadeśopaviṣṭaiḥ sahasraśo nibaddhacakravā-<94,22>
lairanekakāryāgatairdarśanotsukaiḥ samantato vividhaśāstrāñjanonmīli-<94,23>
tabuddhilocanaiścīvaracchadmanā vinayānurāgibhirdharmapaṭairivāvaguṇṭhitaiḥ śā-<95,1>
kyamuniśāsanapathadhaureyai raktapaṭaiḥ pāśupatairdvijaiśca divāniśamāsevya-<95,2>
mānamabhyantarapraviṣṭānāṃ ca sāmantānāṃ jaghanopaviṣṭapuruṣotsaṅgasthi-<95,3>
tadviguṇakuthābhiraticirāvasthānanirvedaprasuptādhoraṇābhiḥ saparyāṇābhi-<95,4>
rniścalāvasthānapracalāyitābhiḥ śatasahasraśaḥ kariṇībhirākīrṇa śuka-<95,5>
nāsagṛhadvāramāsādya satvarapradhāvitairdvāradeśāvasthitaiḥ pratīhārapuruṣaira-<95,6>
nivāryamāṇopi rājakula iva rājaputro bāhyāṅgaṇa eva turaṃgādavata-<95,7>
tāra | dvāradeśāvasthāpitaturaṃgaśca vaiśampāyanamavalambya puraḥpradhāvitaiḥ <95,8>
samutsāritaparijanaistathaiva pratīhāramaṇḍalairupadiśyamānamārgastathaiva ca-<95,9>
litamukuṭakoṭibhirnarendravṛndaiḥ sevāsamupasthitairutthāyotthāya praṇamya-<95,10>
mānastathaiva pracaṇḍapratīhārahuṃkārabhayamūkībhavatparijanāni pracalitave-<95,11>
tralatācakitasāmantacakracaraṇaśatacalitavasuṃdharāṇi kakṣāntarāṇi ni-<95,12>
rīkṣamāṇastathaiva navanavasudhāvadātaprāsādasahasranirantaraṃ dvitīyamiva <95,13>
rājakulaṃ śukanāsabhavanaṃ viveśa | praviśya cānekanarendrasahasramadhyo-<95,14>
paviṣṭamaparamiva pitaramupadarśitavinayo dūrāvanatena maulinā śukanāsaṃ <95,15>
vavande | <95,16>

yāmāvasthitavividhagajaghaṭāsaṃkaṭamanekaturaṃgasahasrasaṃbādhamaparimitajanasamūhasahasrasaṃmardasaṃkulamekadeśopaviṣṭaiḥ sahasraśo nibaddhacakravālairanekakāryāgatairdarśanotsukaiḥ samantato vividhaśāstrāñjanonmīlitabuddhilocanaiścīvaracchadmanā vinayānurāgibhirdharmapaṭairivāvaguṇṭhitaiḥ śākyamuniśāsanapathadhaureyai raktapaṭaiḥ pāśupatairdvijaiśca divāniśamāsevyamānamabhyantarapraviṣṭānāṃ ca sāmantānāṃ jaghanopaviṣṭapuruṣotsaṅgasthitadviguṇakuthābhiraticirāvasthānanirvedaprasuptādhoraṇābhiḥ saparyāṇābhirniścalāvasthānapracalāyitābhiḥ śatasahasraśaḥ kariṇībhirākīrṇa śukanāsagṛhadvāramāsādya satvarapradhāvitairdvāradeśāvasthitaiḥ pratīhārapuruṣairanivāryamāṇopi rājakula iva rājaputro bāhyāṅgaṇa eva turaṃgādavatatāra | dvāradeśāvasthāpitaturaṃgaśca vaiśampāyanamavalambya puraḥpradhāvitaiḥ samutsāritaparijanaistathaiva pratīhāramaṇḍalairupadiśyamānamārgastathaiva calitamukuṭakoṭibhirnarendravṛndaiḥ sevāsamupasthitairutthāyotthāya praṇamyamānastathaiva pracaṇḍapratīhārahuṃkārabhayamūkībhavatparijanāni pracalitavetralatācakitasāmantacakracaraṇaśatacalitavasuṃdharāṇi kakṣāntarāṇi nirīkṣamāṇastathaiva navanavasudhāvadātaprāsādasahasranirantaraṃ dvitīyamiva rājakulaṃ śukanāsabhavanaṃ viveśa | praviśya cānekanarendrasahasramadhyopaviṣṭamaparamiva pitaramupadarśitavinayo dūrāvanatena maulinā śukanāsaṃ vavande |

95,16

śukanāsastaṃ sasaṃbhramamutthāyānupūrvyeṇotthitarājalokaḥ sādaramabhi-<95,17>
mukhadattāviralapadaḥ praharṣavisphāritalocanāgatānandajalakaṇaḥ saha vai-<95,18>
śampāyanena premṇā gāḍhamāliliṅga | āliṅgitonmuktaśca sādaropanī-<95,19>
tamapahāya ratnāsanamavanāveva rājaputraḥ samupāviśattadanu ca vaiśa-<95,20>
mpāyanaḥ | samupaviṣṭe ca rājaputre śukanāsavarjamanyadakhilamavanipāla-<95,21>
cakramujjhitanijāsanamavanitalamabhajata | sthitvā ca tūṣṇīṃ kṣaṇamiva <95,22>
śukanāsaḥ samudgataprītipulakairaṅgairāvedyamānahṛdayaharṣaprakarṣastamabravīt | <95,23>

śukanāsastaṃ sasaṃbhramamutthāyānupūrvyeṇotthitarājalokaḥ sādaramabhimukhadattāviralapadaḥ praharṣavisphāritalocanāgatānandajalakaṇaḥ saha vaiśampāyanena premṇā gāḍhamāliliṅga | āliṅgitonmuktaśca sādaropanītamapahāya ratnāsanamavanāveva rājaputraḥ samupāviśattadanu ca vaiśampāyanaḥ | samupaviṣṭe ca rājaputre śukanāsavarjamanyadakhilamavanipālacakramujjhitanijāsanamavanitalamabhajata | sthitvā ca tūṣṇīṃ kṣaṇamiva śukanāsaḥ samudgataprītipulakairaṅgairāvedyamānahṛdayaharṣaprakarṣastamabravīt |

95,23

tāta candrāpīḍādya khalu devasya tārāpīḍasya samāptavidyamupā-<96,1>
rūḍhayauvanamālokya bhavantaṃ sucirādbhuvanarājyaphalaprāptirupajātā | a-<96,2>
dya samṛddhāḥ sarvā gurujanāśiṣaḥ | adya phalitamanekajanmāntaropā-<96,3>
ttamavadātaṃ karma | adya prasannāḥ kuladevatāḥ | na hyapuṇyabhājāṃ bha-<96,4>
vādṛśāstribhuvanavismayahetavaḥ putratāṃ pratipadyante | kvedaṃ vayaḥ | <96,5>
kveyamamānuṣī śaktiḥ | kva cedamaśeṣavidyāgrahaṇasāmarthyam | aho <96,6>
dhanyāḥ prajā yāsāṃ bharatabhagīrathapratimo bhavānutpannaḥ pālayitā | <96,7>
kiṃ khalu kṛtamavadātaṃ karma vasuṃdharayā yayāsi bhartā samāsāditaḥ | <96,8>
harivakṣaḥsthalanivāsāsadgrahavyasaninī hatā khalu lakṣmīryā vigrahavatī <96,9>
bhavantaṃ nopasarpati | sarvathā kalpakoṭīrmahāvarāha iva daṃṣṭrāvalayena vaha <96,10>
bāhunā vasuṃdharābhāraṃ saha pitrā | ityabhidhāya ca svayamābharaṇavasa-<96,11>
nakusumāṅgarāgādibhirabhyarcya visarjayāṃcakāra | visarjitaścotthāyā-<96,12>
ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dṛṣṭvā vaiśampāyanamātaraṃ manoramābhidhānāṃ nirgatya sa-<96,13>
māruhyendrāyudhaṃ pitrā pūrvakalpitaṃ praticchandakamiva rājakulasya dvā-<96,14>
rāvasthitasitapūrṇakalaśamābaddhaharitavandanamālamullasitasitapatākāsa-<96,15>
hasramabhyāhatamaṅgalatūryaravaparipūritadigantaramuparacitavikacakamalaku-<96,16>
sumaprakaramacirakṛtāgnikāryamujjvalaviviktaparijanamupapāditāśeṣagṛha-<96,17>
praveśamaṅgalaṃ kumāro bhavanaṃ jagāma | gatvā ca śrīmaṇḍapāvasthite <96,18>
śayane muhūrtamupaviśya saha tena rājaputralokenābhiṣekādikamaśanāva-<96,19>
sānamakaroddivasavidhim | abhyantare ca svaśayanīyagṛha evendrāyudha-<96,20>
syāvasthānamakalpayat | <96,21>

tāta candrāpīḍādya khalu devasya tārāpīḍasya samāptavidyamupārūḍhayauvanamālokya bhavantaṃ sucirādbhuvanarājyaphalaprāptirupajātā | adya samṛddhāḥ sarvā gurujanāśiṣaḥ | adya phalitamanekajanmāntaropāttamavadātaṃ karma | adya prasannāḥ kuladevatāḥ | na hyapuṇyabhājāṃ bhavādṛśāstribhuvanavismayahetavaḥ putratāṃ pratipadyante | kvedaṃ vayaḥ | kveyamamānuṣī śaktiḥ | kva cedamaśeṣavidyāgrahaṇasāmarthyam | aho dhanyāḥ prajā yāsāṃ bharatabhagīrathapratimo bhavānutpannaḥ pālayitā | kiṃ khalu kṛtamavadātaṃ karma vasuṃdharayā yayāsi bhartā samāsāditaḥ | harivakṣaḥsthalanivāsāsadgrahavyasaninī hatā khalu lakṣmīryā vigrahavatī bhavantaṃ nopasarpati | sarvathā kalpakoṭīrmahāvarāha iva daṃṣṭrāvalayena vaha bāhunā vasuṃdharābhāraṃ saha pitrā | ityabhidhāya ca svayamābharaṇavasanakusumāṅgarāgādibhirabhyarcya visarjayāṃcakāra | visarjitaścotthāyāntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dṛṣṭvā vaiśampāyanamātaraṃ manoramābhidhānāṃ nirgatya samāruhyendrāyudhaṃ pitrā pūrvakalpitaṃ praticchandakamiva rājakulasya dvārāvasthitasitapūrṇakalaśamābaddhaharitavandanamālamullasitasitapatākāsahasramabhyāhatamaṅgalatūryaravaparipūritadigantaramuparacitavikacakamalakusumaprakaramacirakṛtāgnikāryamujjvalaviviktaparijanamupapāditāśeṣagṛhapraveśamaṅgalaṃ kumāro bhavanaṃ jagāma | gatvā ca śrīmaṇḍapāvasthite śayane muhūrtamupaviśya saha tena rājaputralokenābhiṣekādikamaśanāvasānamakaroddivasavidhim | abhyantare ca svaśayanīyagṛha evendrāyudhasyāvasthānamakalpayat |

96,21

evaṃprāyeṇa cāsyodantena tadahaḥ pariṇatimupayayau | gaganatalādava-<96,22>
tarantyā divasaśriyaḥ padmarāganūpuramiva svaprabhāpihitarandhraṃ ravimaṇḍa-<96,23>
lamunmuktapādaṃ papāta | salilapravāha iva rathacakramārgānusāreṇa di-<97,1>
vasakarasya vāsarālokaḥ pratīcīṃ kakubhamagāt | abhinavapallavalohi-<97,2>
tatalena kareṇevādhomukhaprasṛtena divasakarabimbena vāsaraḥ kamala-<97,3>
rāgamaśeṣaṃ mamārja | kamalinīparimalaparicayāgatālimālākulitakaṇṭhaṃ <97,4>
kālapāśairiva cakravākamithunamākṛṣyamāṇaṃ vijaghaṭe | karapuṭairādi-<97,5>
vasāntamāpītamaravindamadhurasamiva raktātapacchalena gaganagamanakhedā-<97,6>
diva divasakarabimbaṃ vavāma | <97,7>

evaṃprāyeṇa cāsyodantena tadahaḥ pariṇatimupayayau | gaganatalādavatarantyā divasaśriyaḥ padmarāganūpuramiva svaprabhāpihitarandhraṃ ravimaṇḍalamunmuktapādaṃ papāta | salilapravāha iva rathacakramārgānusāreṇa divasakarasya vāsarālokaḥ pratīcīṃ kakubhamagāt | abhinavapallavalohitatalena kareṇevādhomukhaprasṛtena divasakarabimbena vāsaraḥ kamalarāgamaśeṣaṃ mamārja | kamalinīparimalaparicayāgatālimālākulitakaṇṭhaṃ kālapāśairiva cakravākamithunamākṛṣyamāṇaṃ vijaghaṭe | karapuṭairādivasāntamāpītamaravindamadhurasamiva raktātapacchalena gaganagamanakhedādiva divasakarabimbaṃ vavāma |

97,7

krameṇa ca pratīcīkarṇapūraraktotpale lokāntaramupagate bhagavati <97,8>
gabhastimālini samullasitāyāmambarataṭākavikacakamalinyāṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ <97,9>
kṛṣṇāgurupaṅkapattralatāsviva timiralekhāsu sphurantīṣu diśāṃ mukheṣva-<97,10>
likulamalinena kuvalayavaneneva raktakamalākare timiranikareṇotsā-<97,11>
ryamāṇe saṃdhyārāge kamalinīnipītamātapamunmūlayitumandhakārapallave-<97,12>
ṣviva viśatsu raktakamalodarāṇi madhukarakuleṣu śanaiḥ śanaiśca ni-<97,13>
śāvilāsinīmukhāvataṃsapallave galite saṃdhyārāge dikṣu dikṣu vikṣipteṣu <97,14>
saṃdhyādevatārcanabalipiṇḍeṣu śikharadeśalagnatimirāsvanārūḍhamayūrāsva-<97,15>
pi mayūrādhiṣṭhitāsviva mayūrayaṣṭiṣu gavākṣavivaranilīneṣu prāsādala-<97,16>
kṣmīkarṇotpaleṣu pārāvateṣu vigatavilāsinīsaṃvāhananiścalakāñcanapī-<97,17>
ṭhāsu mūkībhūtaghaṇṭāsvarāsvantaḥpuradolāsu bhavanasahakāraśākhāvala-<97,18>
mbitapañjareṣu vigatālāpeṣu śukasārikānivaheṣu saṃgītavirāmaviśrā-<97,19>
ntaravāsūtsāryamāṇāsu vīṇāsu yuvatinūpuraśabdopaśamanibhṛteṣu bhava-<97,20>
nakalahaṃseṣvapanīyamānakarṇaśaṅkhacāmaranakṣatramālāmaṇḍaneṣu madhukarakula-<97,21>
śūnyakapolabhittiṣu mattavāraṇeṣu pradīpyamāneṣu rājavallabhaturaṃgamama-<97,22>
ndurāpradīpeṣu praviśantīṣu prathamayāmakuñjaraghaṭāsu kṛtarājasvastya-<97,23>
yaneṣu niṣkrāmatsu purohiteṣu visarjitarājalokaviralaparijaneṣu vi-<98,1>
stāriteṣviva rājakulakakṣāntareṣu prajvalitadīpikāsahasrapratibimba-<98,2>
cumbiteṣu kṛtavikacacampakadalopahāreṣviva maṇibhūmikuṭṭimeṣu nipa-<98,3>
titadīpālokāsu ravivirahārtanalinīvinodanāgatabālātapāsviva bhava-<98,4>
nadīrghikāsu nidrālaseṣu pañjarakesariṣu samāropitakārmuke gṛhīta-<98,5>
sāyake yāmika ivāntaḥpurapraviṣṭe makaraketāvavataṃsapallaveṣviva sarā-<98,6>
geṣu karṇe kriyamāṇeṣu suratadūtīvacaneṣu sūryakāntamaṇibhya iva saṃkrā-<98,7>
ntānaleṣu jvalatsu māninīnāṃ śokavidhureṣu hṛdayeṣu pravṛtte pradoṣasa-<98,8>
maye candrāpīḍaḥ prajvalitadīpikācakravālaparivāraścaraṇābhyāmeva rā-<98,9>
jakulaṃ gatvā pituḥ samīpe muhūrtaṃ sthitvā dṛṣṭvā ca vilāsavatīmā-<98,10>
gatya svabhavanamanekaratnaprabhāśabalamuragarājaphaṇāmaṇḍalamiva hṛṣīkeśaḥ <98,11>
śayanatalamadhiśiśye | <98,12>

krameṇa ca pratīcīkarṇapūraraktotpale lokāntaramupagate bhagavati gabhastimālini samullasitāyāmambarataṭākavikacakamalinyāṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ kṛṣṇāgurupaṅkapattralatāsviva timiralekhāsu sphurantīṣu diśāṃ mukheṣvalikulamalinena kuvalayavaneneva raktakamalākare timiranikareṇotsāryamāṇe saṃdhyārāge kamalinīnipītamātapamunmūlayitumandhakārapallaveṣviva viśatsu raktakamalodarāṇi madhukarakuleṣu śanaiḥ śanaiśca niśāvilāsinīmukhāvataṃsapallave galite saṃdhyārāge dikṣu dikṣu vikṣipteṣu saṃdhyādevatārcanabalipiṇḍeṣu śikharadeśalagnatimirāsvanārūḍhamayūrāsvapi mayūrādhiṣṭhitāsviva mayūrayaṣṭiṣu gavākṣavivaranilīneṣu prāsādalakṣmīkarṇotpaleṣu pārāvateṣu vigatavilāsinīsaṃvāhananiścalakāñcanapīṭhāsu mūkībhūtaghaṇṭāsvarāsvantaḥpuradolāsu bhavanasahakāraśākhāvalambitapañjareṣu vigatālāpeṣu śukasārikānivaheṣu saṃgītavirāmaviśrāntaravāsūtsāryamāṇāsu vīṇāsu yuvatinūpuraśabdopaśamanibhṛteṣu bhavanakalahaṃseṣvapanīyamānakarṇaśaṅkhacāmaranakṣatramālāmaṇḍaneṣu madhukarakulaśūnyakapolabhittiṣu mattavāraṇeṣu pradīpyamāneṣu rājavallabhaturaṃgamamandurāpradīpeṣu praviśantīṣu prathamayāmakuñjaraghaṭāsu kṛtarājasvastyayaneṣu niṣkrāmatsu purohiteṣu visarjitarājalokaviralaparijaneṣu vistāriteṣviva rājakulakakṣāntareṣu prajvalitadīpikāsahasrapratibimbacumbiteṣu kṛtavikacacampakadalopahāreṣviva maṇibhūmikuṭṭimeṣu nipatitadīpālokāsu ravivirahārtanalinīvinodanāgatabālātapāsviva bhavanadīrghikāsu nidrālaseṣu pañjarakesariṣu samāropitakārmuke gṛhītasāyake yāmika ivāntaḥpurapraviṣṭe makaraketāvavataṃsapallaveṣviva sarāgeṣu karṇe kriyamāṇeṣu suratadūtīvacaneṣu sūryakāntamaṇibhya iva saṃkrāntānaleṣu jvalatsu māninīnāṃ śokavidhureṣu hṛdayeṣu pravṛtte pradoṣasamaye candrāpīḍaḥ prajvalitadīpikācakravālaparivāraścaraṇābhyāmeva rājakulaṃ gatvā pituḥ samīpe muhūrtaṃ sthitvā dṛṣṭvā ca vilāsavatīmāgatya svabhavanamanekaratnaprabhāśabalamuragarājaphaṇāmaṇḍalamiva hṛṣīkeśaḥ śayanatalamadhiśiśye |

98,12

prabhātāyāṃ ca niśīthinyāṃ samutthāya samabhyanujñātaḥ pitrābhinavamṛ-<98,13>
gayākautukāvakṛṣyamāṇahṛdayo bhagavatyanudita eva sahasraraśmāvāruhye-<98,14>
ndrāyudhamagrato bāleyapramāṇānākarṣadbhiścāmīkaraśṛṅkhalābhiḥ kauleyakā-<98,15>
ñjaravyāghracarmaśabalavasanakañcukadhāribhiranekavarṇapaṭṭacīrikodvaddhamauli-<98,16>
bhirupacitaśmaśrugahanamukhairekakarṇāvasaktahematālīpuṭairābaddhanibiḍaka-<98,17>
kṣairanavarataśramopacitorupiṇḍakaiḥ kodaṇḍapāṇibhiḥ śvapoṣakairanavarata-<98,18>
kṛtakolāhalaiḥ pradhāvadbhirdviguṇīkriyamāṇagamanotsāho bahugajaturaga-<98,19>
padātiparivṛto vanaṃ yayau | tatra ca karṇāntāvakṛṣṭamuktairvikacakuva-<98,20>
layapalāśakāntibhirbhallairmadakalakalabhakumbhabhittibhiduraiśca nārācaiścā-<98,21>
paṭaṃkāraravabhayacakitavanadevatārdhākṣavīkṣito vanavarāhānkesariṇaḥ śara-<98,22>
bhāṃścamarānanekakuraṅgakāṃśca sahasraśo jaghāna | anyāṃśca jīvata eva ma-<98,23>
hāprāṇatayā sphurato jagrāha | <99,1>

prabhātāyāṃ ca niśīthinyāṃ samutthāya samabhyanujñātaḥ pitrābhinavamṛgayākautukāvakṛṣyamāṇahṛdayo bhagavatyanudita eva sahasraraśmāvāruhyendrāyudhamagrato bāleyapramāṇānākarṣadbhiścāmīkaraśṛṅkhalābhiḥ kauleyakāñjaravyāghracarmaśabalavasanakañcukadhāribhiranekavarṇapaṭṭacīrikodvaddhamaulibhirupacitaśmaśrugahanamukhairekakarṇāvasaktahematālīpuṭairābaddhanibiḍakakṣairanavarataśramopacitorupiṇḍakaiḥ kodaṇḍapāṇibhiḥ śvapoṣakairanavaratakṛtakolāhalaiḥ pradhāvadbhirdviguṇīkriyamāṇagamanotsāho bahugajaturagapadātiparivṛto vanaṃ yayau | tatra ca karṇāntāvakṛṣṭamuktairvikacakuvalayapalāśakāntibhirbhallairmadakalakalabhakumbhabhittibhiduraiśca nārācaiścāpaṭaṃkāraravabhayacakitavanadevatārdhākṣavīkṣito vanavarāhānkesariṇaḥ śarabhāṃścamarānanekakuraṅgakāṃśca sahasraśo jaghāna | anyāṃśca jīvata eva mahāprāṇatayā sphurato jagrāha |

99,1

samārūḍhe ca madhyamahnaḥ savitari vanātsnānotthiteneva śramasalila-<99,2>
binduvarṣamanavaratamujjhatā muhurmuhurdaśanavighaṭṭanaiḥ khaṇakhaṇāyitakharakha-<99,3>
līnena śramaśithilamukhagalitaphenilarudhiralavena paryāṇapaṭṭakānusāro-<99,4>
tthitaphenarājinā karṇāvataṃsīkṛtamutphullakusumaśabalamalipaṭalajhaṃkāra-<99,5>
ravamukharaṃ vanagamanacihnaṃ pallavastabakamudvahatendrāyudhenohyamānaḥ samudga-<99,6>
tasvedatayāntarārdrīkṛtamaṇḍalena mṛgarudhiralavaśataśabalena vāravāṇena <99,7>
dviguṇataramupajanitakāntiranekarūpānusaraṇasaṃbhramaparibhraṣṭacchattradhāratayā <99,8>
chatrīkṛtena navapallavena nivāryamāṇātapo vividhavanalatākusumareṇudhū-<99,9>
saro vasanta iva vigrahavānaśvakhurarajomalinalalāṭābhivyaktāvadāta-<99,10>
svedalekho dūravicchinnena padātiparijanena śūnyīkṛtapurobhāgaḥ prajavitu-<99,11>
raṃgamādhirūḍhairalpāvaśiṣṭaiḥ saha rājaputrairevaṃ mṛgapatirevaṃ varāha evaṃ <99,12>
vanamahiṣa evaṃ śarabha evaṃ hariṇa iti tameva mṛgayāvṛttāntamuccāraya-<99,13>
nsvabhavanamājagāma | <99,14>
